title: Brie and Cheddar Butternut Squash Beer Soup
ingredients: ['salted butter', 'extra virgin olive oil', 'yellow onion, chopped', 'fresh thyme leaves', 'chopped fresh sage', 'cubed butternut squash', 'all-purpose flour', 'bone, chicken, or vegetable broth', 'pumpkin beer/cider', 'whole milk', 'chopped broccoli', 'shredded cheddar cheese', 'creamy brie, cubed', 'cayenne', 'kosher salt and black pepper']
ingredients with measurement: {'salted butter': '3', 'extra virgin olive oil': '2', 'yellow onion, chopped': '1', 'fresh thyme leaves': '2', 'chopped fresh sage': '1', 'cubed butternut squash': '2-3', 'all-purpose flour': '1/4', 'bone, chicken, or vegetable broth': '3', 'pumpkin beer/cider': '1', 'whole milk': '2', 'chopped broccoli': '1', 'shredded cheddar cheese': '2-3', 'creamy brie, cubed': '4', 'cayenne': '1/4', 'kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning'}
instructions: ['1. Melt together the butter and olive oil in a large pot over medium heat. Add the onion, thyme, and sage, cook until fragrant, about 5 minutes. Add the butternut squash, toss, and cook 1-2 minutes. Mix in the flour and cook until golden, about 1 minute. Add the broth, beer/cider, and season with salt and pepper. Bring to a simmer, reduce the heat to medium, and cook, uncovered, until the butternut squash is tender, about 15 minutes.', '2. Remove the soup from the stove. Puree in a blender or use an immersion blender.', '3. Return the soup to the stove and set over low heat. Stir in the milk, broccoli, cheddar cheese, and brie, cooking until melted and creamy. Add the cayenne.', '4. Ladle the soup into bowls and top with a little extra cheddar or a wedge of brie. Enjoy, ideally with\xa0soft pretzels\xa0on the side.']

title: One Pot Buffalo Chicken “Helper”
ingredients: ['extra virgin olive oil', 'chicken breast or thighs, cubed', 'medium yellow onion, chopped', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'chili powder', 'paprika', 'garlic powder', 'short cut pasta', 'chopped broccoli florets', 'milk', 'ketchup', 'pickled jalapeños', 'hot sauce', 'salsa verde', 'shredded cheddar cheese', 'salted butter', 'green onion and cilantro, for serving']
ingredients with measurement: {'extra virgin olive oil': '2', 'chicken breast or thighs, cubed': '2-3', 'medium yellow onion, chopped': '1', 'kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'chili powder': '1', 'paprika': '1', 'garlic powder': '1', 'short cut pasta': '1', 'chopped broccoli florets': '2', 'milk': '1 1/2', 'ketchup': '1', 'pickled jalapeños': '1/4', 'hot sauce': '1/2', 'salsa verde': '1/3', 'shredded cheddar cheese': '1 1/2-2', 'salted butter': '6', 'green onion and cilantro, for serving': 'seasoning'}
instructions: ['1. Preheat the oven to 425. In a large pot set over medium-high heat,\xa0add the olive oil, onion, and chicken. Season with salt and pepper. Cook until lightly seared all over, about 10 minutes. Stir in the chili powder, paprika, and garlic powder, cook for another minute.', '2. Add the pasta and broccoli. Mix gently, then pour over 1/2 cup water and the milk. Add the ketchup and stir to combine. Season with salt.', '3. Bring to a gentle boil over medium-high heat. Simmer for 5 minutes until the pasta is al dente, stirring often. Stir in the jalapeños, salsa, hot sauce, and butter.', '4. Stir in the 1 1/2-2 cups cheese. Cook another few minutes until very creamy. Remove from the heat, top with 1/2 cup cheese. Bake at 425 for 5-10 minutes, until the cheese is melted.', '5. Divide the pasta among bowls and top with green onions and cilantro.']

title: Chili Crisp Chicken and Noodles in Ginger Soy Broth
ingredients: ['salted butter or olive oil', 'medium shallots, sliced', 'chopped fresh ginger', 'garlic, chopped', 'cubed butternut squash', 'dry white wine', 'low sodium chicken/vegetable broth', 'tamari/soy sauce', 'ramen noodles, cooked to package directions', 'boneless skinless chicken breasts or thighs, thinly sliced', 'cornstarch or arrowroot powder', 'extra virgin olive oil', 'Thai red curry paste', 'fish sauce, tamari sauce, or soy sauce', 'salted butter', 'garlic, chopped', 'chili pepper flakes']
ingredients with measurement: {'salted butter or olive oil': '2', 'medium shallots, sliced': '3-4', 'chopped fresh ginger': '1', 'garlic, chopped': '3-4', 'cubed butternut squash': '2-3', 'dry white wine': '1/3', 'low sodium chicken/vegetable broth': '4', 'tamari/soy sauce': '1/3', 'ramen noodles, cooked to package directions': '8', 'boneless skinless chicken breasts or thighs, thinly sliced': '1 1/2', 'cornstarch or arrowroot powder': '1', 'extra virgin olive oil': '2', 'Thai red curry paste': '1/4', 'fish sauce, tamari sauce, or soy sauce': '1', 'salted butter': '6', 'chili pepper flakes': 'seasoning'}
instructions: ['1. To make the broth. Melt together the butter, shallots, and butternut squash in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Cook until softened, about 5 minutes. Mix in the wine, cooking until the wine cooks into the shallots, another 5 minutes. Add ginger and garlic and cook 1 minute.', '2. Pour in the broth, soy sauce, and pinch of pepper. Simmer over low heat.', '3. In a bowl, toss together the chicken and cornstarch.', '4. Heat the olive oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add the Thai red curry paste and cook 1-2 minutes, until fragrant. Add the chicken and toss to coat in the curry paste. Cook until the chicken becomes crispy, about 8 minutes. Remove from the heat and add the fish sauce or tamari/soy sauce.', '5. Meanwhile, in a small skillet melt together the butter, garlic, and a pinch of chili flakes. Cook until the butter is browning and the garlic crisps.', '6. Arrange the noodles in shallow bowls. Ladle the steaming broth over top. Top with chili crisp sauce, chicken, and green onions. Enjoy!']

title: Garlic Butter Pizza Egg Rolls
ingredients: ['grated parmesan cheese', 'dried basil', 'dried oregano', 'dried parsley', 'chili flakes', 'garlic, grated', 'shredded mozzarella cheese', 'marinara sauce', 'provolone cheese', 'square egg roll wrappers', 'thinly sliced pepperoni', 'salted butter', 'chopped fresh sage']
ingredients with measurement: {'grated parmesan cheese': '3/4', 'dried basil': '2', 'dried oregano': '1', 'dried parsley': '1', 'chili flakes': '1', 'garlic, grated': '2', 'shredded mozzarella cheese': '1', 'marinara sauce': '1 – 1 1/2', 'provolone cheese': '12', 'square egg roll wrappers': '12-16', 'thinly sliced pepperoni': '1/2', 'salted butter': '8', 'chopped fresh sage': '2'}
instructions: ['1. Preheat the oven to 425° F. Lightly grease 2 baking sheets.', '2. In a bowl, combine 1/2 cup grated parmesan, the dried basil, oregano, parsley, chili flakes, and 1 clove of garlic. Mix in the mozzarella.', '3. \xa0To assemble, brush water around the edges of the wrapper, then layer with 1 tablespoon of marinara sauce, 1 slice provolone, and about 1 tablespoon of the mozzarella mix. Add 1 pepperoni slice. Do not overstuff these with ingredients. Roll up and place on the baking sheet.', "4. Melt 5 tablespoons of butter, then brush each roll with the butter. Sprinkle evenly with the remaining 1/4 cup parmesan cheese. Bake for 10-12 minutes, then flip, add 1-2 pepperoni slices, and cook another 8-10 minutes, or until the rolls are crisp. The cheese may melt out a bit, but that's ok.", '5. Meanwhile, melt 3 tablespoons butter together with the sage, let the sage get crisp, then remove from the heat and add 1 clove of grated garlic. Top each roll with the garlic butter. Serve with marinara sauce on the side.']

title: Crockpot Coconut Butter Chicken Meatballs
ingredients: ['garam masala', 'fresh grated ginger', 'yellow curry powder', 'turmeric', 'cayenne pepper, use to your taste', 'ground chicken, pork, or turkey', 'plain Greek yogurt', 'kosher salt', 'yellow onion, chopped', 'shallot, chopped', 'whole cloves garlic', 'tomato paste', 'acorn squash, cut into wedges', 'full-fat coconut milk', 'salted butter', 'honey', 'fresh cilantro, chopped', 'steamed rice. and naan, for serving']
ingredients with measurement: {'garam masala': '2', 'fresh grated ginger': '1', 'yellow curry powder': '2', 'turmeric': '1/2', 'cayenne pepper, use to your taste': '1', 'ground chicken, pork, or turkey': '1 1/2', 'plain Greek yogurt': '1/4', 'kosher salt': 'seasoning', 'yellow onion, chopped': '1', 'shallot, chopped': '1', 'whole cloves garlic': '6', 'tomato paste': '1/2', 'acorn squash, cut into wedges': '1', 'full-fat coconut milk': '1', 'salted butter': '4', 'honey': '1', 'fresh cilantro, chopped': '1/2', 'steamed rice. and naan, for serving': 'seasoning'}
instructions: ['1. Mix the spices. In a bowl mix the garam masala, ginger, curry powder, turmeric, and cayenne pepper.', '2. Add the chicken, half of the spice mix, and the yogurt to a bowl. Season with salt. Mix to combine. Coat your hands with oil, and roll the meat into tablespoon-size balls (will make 15-16 meatballs). Place the meatballs, onion, shallot, and garlic cloves in the crockpot. Add the tomato paste.', '3. Pour over 1/3 cup water and sprinkle the remaining spices over the meatballs. Add garlic, then the acorn squash wedges. Cover and cook on low for 3-4 hours or on high for 1-2 hours.', '4. Preheat the broiler to high. Remove the squash and garlic from the slow cooker and place on a baking sheet. Add the butter. Broil 2-5 minutes, until charred. Peel away the garlic skin, then chop and mix with the butter, honey, and squash on the sheet pan.', '5. Meanwhile, crank the heat on the crockpot to high. Stir in the coconut milk and cook, uncovered, 10 minutes until warmed. Stir in the cilantro.', '6. Serve the meatballs and sauce over bowls of rice with fresh naan and squash on the side. Enjoy!']

title: Baked Garlic Parmesan Buffalo Chicken Wings
ingredients: ['chicken wings or drumsticks', 'smoked paprika', 'onion powder', 'garlic powder', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'flour or all-purpose gluten-free flour', 'garlic', 'extra virgin olive oil', 'hot sauce', 'salted butter', 'seasoned salt', 'cayenne pepper', 'grated parmesan cheese', 'blue cheese or ranch dressing, for serving', 'sliced green onions, for serving']
ingredients with measurement: {'chicken wings or drumsticks': '2', 'smoked paprika': '1', 'onion powder': '1', 'garlic powder': '1', 'kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'flour or all-purpose gluten-free flour': '1/4', 'garlic': '6-8', 'extra virgin olive oil': '4', 'hot sauce': '1/2', 'salted butter': '6', 'seasoned salt': '1-2', 'cayenne pepper': '1/2', 'grated parmesan cheese': '1/2', 'blue cheese or ranch dressing, for serving': 'seasoning', 'sliced green onions, for serving': 'seasoning'}
instructions: ['1. Preheat the oven to 450° F. Line a baking sheet with parchment paper or rub with oil.', '2. On the sheet pan, toss together the chicken wings, paprika, onion powder, garlic powder, salt, and pepper. Add the flour and toss again. Add 2 tablespoons olive oil, tossing to coat. Drop the garlic cloves around the chicken. Bake for 20 minutes then pull the garlic off the pan. Flip the the wings, then return to the oven and bake another 15-20 minutes, until the chicken is crispy and cooked through. My wings needed 30 minutes.', '3. Meanwhile, make the sauce. Remove the garlic skin and chop/mash the roasted cloves into a paste. In a saucepan set over medium heat, melt together the hot sauce, butter, seasoned salt, and cayenne. Stir until melted and combined. Remove from the heat and mix in the garlic.', '4. Remove the chicken from the oven and toss with parmesan. Then pour the buffalo sauce over the chicken and toss the chicken wings up in the sauce. Bake another 5 minutes, until the buffalo sauce is baked onto the chicken.', '5. Serve the chicken and buffalo sauce with green onions and blue cheese or ranch dressing. YUM!']

title: Roasted Butternut Squash and Sun-Dried Tomato Chicken Pasta
ingredients: ['extra virgin olive oil', 'cubed butternut squash', 'garlic', 'shallot, quartered', 'chopped fresh sage', 'chopped fresh rosemary', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'heavy cream', 'grated parmesan cheese', 'oil-packed sun-dried tomatoes', 'boneless skinless chicken breasts, cubed', 'Italian seasoning (see note)', 'chili flakes', 'salted butter', 'short cut pasta']
ingredients with measurement: {'extra virgin olive oil': '1', 'cubed butternut squash': '2', 'garlic': '6-10', 'shallot, quartered': '1', 'chopped fresh sage': '2', 'chopped fresh rosemary': '1', 'kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'heavy cream': '1', 'grated parmesan cheese': '1', 'oil-packed sun-dried tomatoes': '1', 'boneless skinless chicken breasts, cubed': '1', 'Italian seasoning (see note)': '4', 'chili flakes': 'seasoning', 'salted butter': '2', 'short cut pasta': '1'}
instructions: ['1. Preheat oven to 400° F.', '2. On a baking sheet, toss together the olive oil, butternut squash, garlic, shallot, sage, rosemary, salt, and pepper. Bake 20 minutes, until the squash is tender.', '3. Add the butternut squash, garlic, and shallot to a food processor. Puree until smooth. Add 1/3 cup cream/milk and 1/3 cup parmesan. Season with salt and pepper. Blend until creamy.', '4. Meanwhile, drain 3 tablespoons of oil from the sun-dried tomato jar into a large pot or skillet with sides. Chop the sun-dried tomatoes and set aside.', '5. Set the pot over medium-high heat. Add the chicken, 2 tablespoons of Italian seasoning, salt, and pepper. Cook until golden brown, 5 minutes. Remove the chicken from the pot.', '6.To the same pot, add the butter and 1 tablespoon Italian seasoning. Cook until fragrant, 1 minute. Add 3 1/2 cups water. Bring to a boil, add the pasta, and cook, stirring often, until the pasta is al dente, 8 minutes. Stir in the butternut puree, 2/3 cup cream, 2/3 cup parmesan, and chopped sun-dried tomatoes. Slide the chicken and any juices left on the plate.', '7. Serve topped with parmesan and basil. EAT and ENJOY.']

title: Crispy Jalapeño Cream Cheese Cauliflower Taquitos
ingredients: ['chopped cauliflower', 'extra virgin olive oil', 'seasoned salt', 'cream cheese, at room temperature', 'jalapeño, seeded if desired, and chopped', 'pickled jalapeños, chopped', 'fresh cilantro, chopped', 'fresh dill, chopped', 'green onions, chopped', 'buffalo sauce', 'shredded pepper jack or cheddar cheese', 'corn tortillas, warmed', 'plain greek yogurt or sour cream', 'buttermilk', 'honey', 'dijon mustard', 'pickled jalapeños', 'fresh basil', 'fresh cilantro', 'fresh chopped chives', 'kosher salt and black pepper']
ingredients with measurement: {'chopped cauliflower': '3', 'extra virgin olive oil': '2', 'seasoned salt': '1', 'cream cheese, at room temperature': '4', 'jalapeño, seeded if desired, and chopped': '1', 'pickled jalapeños, chopped': '2', 'fresh cilantro, chopped': '1/4', 'fresh dill, chopped': '2', 'green onions, chopped': '2', 'buffalo sauce': '1/3', 'shredded pepper jack or cheddar cheese': '1', 'corn tortillas, warmed': '16-20', 'plain greek yogurt or sour cream': '1/2', 'buttermilk': '3', 'honey': '1', 'dijon mustard': '1', 'pickled jalapeños': '2', 'fresh basil': '1/2', 'fresh cilantro': '1/2', 'fresh chopped chives': '1/4', 'kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning'}
instructions: ['1. Preheat the oven to 425° F. On a baking sheet, combine the cauliflower, olive oil, paprika, seasoned salt, and a pinch each of salt and pepper. Toss well to evenly coat. Transfer to the oven and roast for 20 minutes, or until tender and lightly charred.', '2. In a bowl, combine the roasted cauliflower, cream cheese, jalapeño, pickled jalapeños, cilantro, dill, and green onions. Stir in the cheese and buffalo sauce.', '3. Warm the tortillas for 30 seconds to 1 minute in the microwave, until pliable. On a baking sheet, rub the tortillas with olive oil. Spoon 2 tablespoons of the cauliflower down the middle of the tortilla. Roll up and place seam-side down on the baking sheet. Bake for 5-8 minutes, then flip and cook another 5 minutes, or until the cheese has melted and the tortillas are crisp.', '4. Meanwhile, make the honey mustard ranch. Combine all ingredients in a blender and mix until creamy, season with salt.', '5. Serve the taquitos topped with buffalo sauce, ranch, and any other desired toppings.']

title: White Chicken Chili Corn Chowder
ingredients: ['thick-cut bacon, chopped', 'medium yellow onion, chopped', 'garlic, chopped', 'yellow corn kernels', 'russet potato, peeled and cubed', 'boneless, skinless, chicken breasts or thighs', 'ground cumin', 'smoked paprika', 'chili powder', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'low-sodium chicken broth', 'poblano peppers, seeded and chopped', 'jalapeño, seeded if desired, and chopped', 'milk', 'cream cheese, melted', 'salsa verde', 'shredded cheddar cheese', 'fresh cilantro, chopped', 'avocado, cheddar, and yogurt, for serving']
ingredients with measurement: {'thick-cut bacon, chopped': '6', 'medium yellow onion, chopped': '1', 'garlic, chopped': '4', 'yellow corn kernels': '4', 'russet potato, peeled and cubed': '1', 'boneless, skinless, chicken breasts or thighs': '1', 'ground cumin': '2', 'smoked paprika': '1', 'chili powder': '1/2', 'kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'low-sodium chicken broth': '3', 'poblano peppers, seeded and chopped': '2', 'jalapeño, seeded if desired, and chopped': '1', 'milk': '2', 'cream cheese, melted': '4', 'salsa verde': '3/4', 'shredded cheddar cheese': '2', 'fresh cilantro, chopped': '1/2', 'avocado, cheddar, and yogurt, for serving': 'seasoning'}
instructions: ['1. In a large pot over medium heat, cook the bacon until crispy. Remove the bacon and reserve for topping.', '2. To the pot, add the onion, cook until fragrant, 5 minutes. Stir in the garlic, cumin, paprika, chili powder, and a pinch each of salt and pepper. Cook 5-10 minutes, until very fragrant. Add the corn, potato, and chicken, then stir in the broth. Season with more salt and pepper. Partially cover and simmer over medium-low heat for 15 minutes, until the chicken is cooked through.', '3. Pull the chicken out and shred using 2 forks.', '4. Transfer 3/4 of the chowder to a blender and blend until mostly smooth. Return to the pot. Stir in the poblano, jalapeño, milk, cream cheese, salsa verde and cheddar. Cook 10 minutes, until the cheese is melted. Remove from the heat and stir in the cilantro. If needed, thin with additional milk.', '5. Ladle the chili into bowls. Top, as desired, with bacon, yogurt, cheese, avocado, cilantro, and green onions. Eat and enjoy!']

title: One Pan Herb Butter Chicken and Zucchini Rice Pilaf
ingredients: ['boneless chicken thighs or breasts', 'extra virgin olive oil', 'grated parmesan, plus parmesan rind', 'garlic, chopped', 'dried thyme', 'dried rosemary', 'smoked paprika', 'cayenne pepper', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'dry white jasmine rice', 'dry orzo pasta', 'yellow onion, chopped', 'grated zucchini', 'chopped sage, plus 8 sage leaves', 'chicken broth', 'salted butter']
ingredients with measurement: {'boneless chicken thighs or breasts': '6', 'extra virgin olive oil': '2', 'grated parmesan, plus parmesan rind': '1/4', 'garlic, chopped': '4', 'dried thyme': '2', 'dried rosemary': '1', 'smoked paprika': '1', 'cayenne pepper': '1/4', 'kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'dry white jasmine rice': '1', 'dry orzo pasta': '3/4', 'yellow onion, chopped': '1', 'grated zucchini': '1', 'chopped sage, plus 8 sage leaves': '1', 'chicken broth': '2', 'salted butter': '4'}
instructions: ['1. Preheat the oven to 400°.', '2. In a bowl, toss together the chicken, olive oil, parmesan, garlic, thyme, rosemary, paprika, cayenne, salt, and pepper.', '3. Pour the rice, orzo, onion, zucchini, and chopped sage into a 9×13-inch baking dish. Pour over 2 cups broth. Add 2 tablespoons butter. Arrange the chicken over the rice and zucchini. Add the parmesan rind, if using. Bake 30-40 minutes, until the rice is fluffy and the chicken is cooked through. If the rice is hard, add 1/3 cup water and cook for an additional 10 minutes.', '4. Just before serving, melt together the 2 tablespoons butter and sage leaves in a skillet set over medium heat. Cook until the butter is browning and the sage is crisp, 4 minutes.', '5. Severe the chicken and rice topped with sage butter. And enjoy!']

title: Parmesan Chicken Florentine and Broccoli Pasta
ingredients: ['chicken cutlets or 8 chicken tenders', 'panko style bread crumbs', 'grated parmesan', 'onion powder', 'garlic powder', 'thinly sliced prosciutto', 'extra virgin olive oil', 'salted butter', 'garlic, chopped', 'chili flakes', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'short cut pasta', 'roughly chopped broccoli', 'fresh basil, chopped', 'heavy cream', 'cream cheese, at room temperature']
ingredients with measurement: {'chicken cutlets or 8 chicken tenders': '6', 'panko style bread crumbs': '1', 'grated parmesan': '2', 'onion powder': '1/2', 'garlic powder': '1/2', 'thinly sliced prosciutto': '3', 'extra virgin olive oil': '3', 'salted butter': '2', 'garlic, chopped': '3', 'chili flakes': 'seasoning', 'kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'short cut pasta': '1', 'roughly chopped broccoli': '2', 'fresh basil, chopped': '1 1/2', 'heavy cream': '3/4', 'cream cheese, at room temperature': '2'}
instructions: ['1. Combine the bread crumbs, 3/4 cup parmesan, and the onion and garlic powder in a shallow bowl. Dredge both sides of the chicken through the bread crumbs, pressing to adhere.', '2. Heat 1 tablespoon of olive oil in a large skillet set over medium-high heat. Add the prosciutto and cook until crispy all over, about 5 minutes. Remove from the skillet and place on a plate.', '3. In the same skillet, add 1 tablespoon of olive oil and the chicken. Sear on both sides until golden and cooked though, 5-8 minutes per side.', '4. Meanwhile, make the pasta. In a large pot set over medium heat, melt together the butter, garlic, and a pinch of chili flakes. Cook 2-3 minutes until the garlic is fragrant. Pour in 4 cups of water and bring to a boil over high heat. Add 1 teaspoon salt, the pasta, and the broccoli. Cook, stirring occasionally, for 8 minutes. Do not drain the water. Stir in the cream, and cream cheese and cook until the cream cheese has melted and the pasta is al dente, about 4-5 minutes more.', '5. Stir in the parmesan until melted and creamy. Remove from the heat. Stir in the basil and season with salt and pepper.', '6. \xa0Divide the pasta between plates and top with chicken, prosciutto, and basil. Enjoy!']

title: One Pan Chipotle Honey Chicken and Rice

title: Skillet Corn and Chipotle Chicken Tortilla Bake
ingredients: ['extra virgin olive oil', 'ground chicken', 'yellow onion, chopped', 'taco seasoning', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'salsa or enchilada sauce', 'chipotle chili in adobo, chopped', 'fresh corn', 'cream cheese, at room temperature', 'plain greek yogurt', 'chili powder', 'shredded Mexican cheese blend', 'tortilla chips', 'avocado, cilantro, and green onions, for serving']
ingredients with measurement: {'extra virgin olive oil': '2', 'ground chicken': '1 1/2', 'yellow onion, chopped': '1', 'taco seasoning': '2', 'kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'salsa or enchilada sauce': '2 1/2', 'chipotle chili in adobo, chopped': '1', 'fresh corn': '2', 'cream cheese, at room temperature': '4', 'plain greek yogurt': '1/4', 'chili powder': '1', 'shredded Mexican cheese blend': '1 1/2', 'tortilla chips': '2', 'avocado, cilantro, and green onions, for serving': 'seasoning'}

title: Sheet Pan Hot Honey Garlic Chicken and Zucchini

title: Street Corn Pasta Salad

instructions: ['1. To make the dressing. Combine all ingredients in a large salad bowl. Season with salt and pepper.', '2. Bring a pot of salted water to a boil. Boil the pasta to al dente, according to package directions. Drain. Immediately toss with the dressing. Add the lettuce, corn, cheddar, basil, cilantro, and avocado. Toss to combine.', '3. title: Crockpot Greek Chicken Meatballs with Creamy Tomato Orzo
ingredients: ['ground chicken, pork, or turkey', 'grated parmesan cheese', 'shallot, chopped', 'garlic, 2 chopped, 6 whole', 'fresh oregano, chopped', 'sweet or regular paprika', 'balsamic vinegar', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'chili flakes', 'extra virgin olive oil', 'cherry tomatoes', 'dry white wine', 'dry orzo pasta', 'heavy cream or whole milk', 'salted butter', 'rosemary', 'fresh thyme', 'crumbled feta', 'fresh basil and dill, for serving']
ingredients with measurement: {'ground chicken, pork, or turkey': '1 1/2', 'grated parmesan cheese': '1/2', 'shallot, chopped': '1', 'garlic, 2 chopped, 6 whole': '8', 'fresh oregano, chopped': '1/4', 'sweet or regular paprika': '2', 'balsamic vinegar': '1', 'kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'chili flakes': 'seasoning', 'extra virgin olive oil': '2', 'cherry tomatoes': '1 1/2', 'dry white wine': '1', 'dry orzo pasta': '2', 'heavy cream or whole milk': '1/2', 'salted butter': '6', 'rosemary': '1', 'fresh thyme': '4', 'crumbled feta': '1/2', 'fresh basil and dill, for serving': 'seasoning'}
instructions: ['1. Add the chicken, parmesan, shallot, 2 chopped cloves of garlic, oregano, paprika, and balsamic vinegar to a bowl. Season with salt, pepper, and chili flakes. Mix to combine. Coat your hands with oil, and roll the meat into tablespoon-size balls (will make 15-16 meatballs). Drizzle with olive oil and place the meatballs in the bowl of your crockpot.', '2. Add the tomatoes. Pour over the wine and 1/2 cup water. Add the whole garlic cloves. Cover and cook on low for 3-4 hours or on high for 1-2 hours.', '3. Preheat the broiler to high. Remove the meatballs and garlic from the slow cooker and place on a baking sheet.', '4. Crank the heat on the slow cooker to high. Stir in the orzo, and 1 cup water. Cover and cook 20-30 minutes, or until the orzo is al dente. If the orzo needs more liquid, add additional water. Stir in the milk/cream.', '5. Arrange the butter, rosemary, and thyme, around the meatballs and garlic, then broil for 1-3 minutes, until crisp. Peel away the garlic skin, then chop and mix with the butter and herbs on the sheet pan. Toss the meatballs in the butter.', '6. Serve the meatballs over the orzo with feta cheese, fresh basil, and dill.']

title: One Pot Cheesy Creamed Corn Orzo
ingredients: ['thick-cut bacon, chopped', 'salted butter', 'small yellow onion, chopped', 'garlic, chopped', 'dry orzo pasta', 'fresh thyme leaves', 'fresh corn', 'fresh thyme leaves', 'chicken broth', 'diced green chilies', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'whole milk or heavy cream', 'grated cheddar cheese', 'grated parmesan cheese', 'green onions, chopped']
ingredients with measurement: {'thick-cut bacon, chopped': '4', 'salted butter': '2', 'small yellow onion, chopped': '1', 'garlic, chopped': '2', 'dry orzo pasta': '1', 'fresh thyme leaves': '2', 'fresh corn': '2', 'chicken broth': '3', 'diced green chilies': '1', 'kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'whole milk or heavy cream': '1/2', 'grated cheddar cheese': '1/2', 'grated parmesan cheese': '1/2', 'green onions, chopped': '2-3'}
instructions: ['1. Heat a pot over medium-high heat and cook the bacon until crisp. Remove the bacon from the pan and drain.', '2. Drain off most of the bacon grease. Add the butter and onion. Cook for 5 minutes until fragrant. Mix in the garlic, orzo, corn, and thyme. Cook until golden and toasted, 2 minutes.', '3. Pour over the broth and bring to a boil. Simmer for 8-10 minutes until the orzo is al dente, stirring often. It should become very creamy.', '4. Stir in the milk, green chilies, cheddar, parmesan, and green onions. Cook another few minutes until warmed through. As the orzo thickens up, add additional broth to thin. This should be creamy, but with just a touch of liquid.', '5. Divide the orzo among bowls and top with bacon and fresh thyme.']

title: Almost Instant Red Curry Beef and Garlic Noodles
ingredients: ['sesame or olive oil', 'butter', 'green onions, sliced', 'Thai red curry paste', 'garlic, chopped', 'shallot, chopped', 'lean ground beef', 'egg', 'bell peppers, thinly sliced', 'chopped broccoli florets', 'chili flakes', 'chopped fresh Thai or regular basil', 'ramen noodles, egg noodles, or 6 ounces of rice noodles', 'tamari or soy sauce', 'honey']

title: Simple Spicy Summer Coconut Chicken Curry
ingredients: ['extra virgin olive oil', 'boneless skinless chicken breast, cubed', 'smoked paprika', 'cayenne pepper', 'red curry paste', 'cinnamon', 'salted butter', 'shallot, chopped', 'chopped fresh ginger', 'fresh thyme', 'chopped summer vegetables: zucchini, bell peppers, corn, summer squash', 'canned coconut milk', 'fish sauce, tamari, or soy sauce', 'fresh chopped basil', 'mango, chopped', 'jalapeño, chopped', 'pickled ginger, chopped']
ingredients with measurement: {'extra virgin olive oil': '2', 'boneless skinless chicken breast, cubed': '1', 'smoked paprika': '1', 'cayenne pepper': '1/2-1', 'red curry paste': '3-4', 'cinnamon': '1/4', 'salted butter': '2', 'shallot, chopped': '1', 'chopped fresh ginger': '1', 'fresh thyme': '2', 'chopped summer vegetables: zucchini, bell peppers, corn, summer squash': '2', 'canned coconut milk': '2 1/2', 'fish sauce, tamari, or soy sauce': '1', 'fresh chopped basil': '1/2', 'mango, chopped': '1', 'jalapeño, chopped': '1', 'pickled ginger, chopped': '1/4'}
instructions: ['1. In a large skillet, combine the oil, chicken, paprika, cayenne, salt, and pepper. Set over medium-high heat, then cook for 3 minutes. Add the curry paste, cinnamon, butter, shallot, ginger, and thyme. Cook another 2 minutes.', '2. Mix in the vegetables, let cook 5 minutes, then pour in the coconut milk and fish sauce. Season with salt. Cook 5-10 minutes until the chicken is cooked through and the sauce has thickened. Stir in the basil.', '3. In a bowl, combine the mango, jalapeño, 1/4 cup freshly torn basil leaves, pickled ginger, and 1 tablespoon ginger juice.', '4. title: Sheet Pan White Pesto Lasagna
ingredients: ['dry lasagna noodles', 'basil pesto', 'garlic, grated', 'fresh thyme leaves', 'dried oregano', 'chili flakes', 'whole milk', 'chopped spinach', 'kosher salt and pepper', 'shredded mozzarella cheese', 'shredded provolone cheese', 'whole milk ricotta cheese', 'heavy cream', 'sliced pepperoni', 'grated parmesan', 'fresh oregano thyme or basil, for serving']
ingredients with measurement: {'dry lasagna noodles': '1', 'basil pesto': '3/4', 'garlic, grated': '3', 'fresh thyme leaves': '1', 'dried oregano': '2', 'chili flakes': 'seasoning', 'whole milk': '2', 'chopped spinach': '2', 'kosher salt and pepper': 'seasoning', 'shredded mozzarella cheese': '1 1/3', 'shredded provolone cheese': '1', 'whole milk ricotta cheese': '1', 'heavy cream': '1/2', 'sliced pepperoni': '1/2', 'grated parmesan': '1/2', 'fresh oregano thyme or basil, for serving': 'seasoning'}
instructions: ['1. Preheat the oven to 375° F. Grease a straight-sided 12 x 17-inch baking sheet. Set aside. Before starting, get all ingredients prepped and ready to use.', '2. Bring a large pot of salted water to a boil. Cook the noodles until al dente, 4-6 minutes, then drain.', '3. Add the noodles back to the hot pot. Toss the noodles with 1/2 cup basil pesto, garlic, thyme, oregano, and chili flakes. Pour in the milk, then add the mozzarella cheese and toss until mostly melted. Add the spinach, and season with salt and pepper.', '4. Mix the ricotta with 1/4 cup basil pesto.', '5. Spoon/pour the noodles and sauce into the prepared baking dish. Dollop the ricotta over the noodles, snuggling some of the cheese underneath the noodles. Pour the cream evenly over the pan. Top with provolone, pepperoni, then parmesan.', '5. Bake 20-30 minutes or until the cheese is bubbling. Top with fresh herbs, and enjoy!']

title: Chili Onion Crisp Salmon Bowl with Avocado Mango Salsa

title: Coconut Curry Chicken Meatballs with Garlic Butter
ingredients: ['ground chicken or ground pork', 'spicy curry powder', 'tamari or soy sauce', 'shallot, chopped', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'chili flakes', 'extra virgin olive oil', 'salted butter', 'Thai red curry paste', 'fresh grated ginger', 'orange or red bell peppers, sliced', 'canned full-fat coconut milk', 'fish sauce', 'chopped Thai basil, or cilantro', 'garlic, chopped', 'limes, for serving']
ingredients with measurement: {'ground chicken or ground pork': '1 1/2', 'spicy curry powder': '1-2', 'tamari or soy sauce': '3', 'shallot, chopped': '1', 'kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'chili flakes': 'seasoning', 'extra virgin olive oil': '1', 'salted butter': '6', 'Thai red curry paste': '1/4', 'fresh grated ginger': '1', 'orange or red bell peppers, sliced': '2', 'canned full-fat coconut milk': '2', 'fish sauce': '1', 'chopped Thai basil, or cilantro': '1/2', 'garlic, chopped': '3-4', 'limes, for serving': 'seasoning'}
instructions: ['1. Preheat the oven to 450 degrees F. Line a baking sheet with parchment.', '2. Add the chicken, curry powder, shallot, 1 tablespoon tamari/soy, salt, and pepper to a bowl. Mix until just combined. Coat your hands with a bit of oil, and roll the meat into tablespoon-size balls (will make 15-20 meatballs) placing them on the prepared baking sheet. Bake for 10 minutes, until the meatballs are crisp.', '3. In a large skillet over medium heat, melt together 1 tablespoon butter, the curry paste, and ginger. Cook, 2-3 minutes until fragrant. Add the peppers, coconut milk, 3 tablespoons tamari/soy sauce, and fish sauce. Slide the meatballs into the sauce and simmer 5 minutes, or until cooked through.', '4. Meanwhile, melt 5 tablespoons butter, the garlic, and a pinch of chili flakes. Cook until the butter is browning and the garlic crisps.', '5. Serve the meatballs and sauce over bowls of rice. Drizzle the butter over the meatballs and top with basil or cilantro.']

title: 20 Minute Thai Basil Beef Rolls
ingredients: ['ground beef', 'black pepper', 'garlic, chopped', 'fresh grated ginger', 'Chinese 5 spice', 'tamari or soy sauce', 'Thai chili sauce', 'chopped green onions', 'Persian cucumbers, chopped', 'cilantro, chopped', 'Thai basil, chopped', 'chopped roasted peanuts', 'flour tortillas, warmed', 'chili paste, for serving', 'toasted sesame oil, for serving']
ingredients with measurement: {'ground beef': '1 1/2', 'black pepper': 'seasoning', 'garlic, chopped': '4', 'fresh grated ginger': '1', 'Chinese 5 spice': '1-3', 'tamari or soy sauce': '1/3', 'Thai chili sauce': '1/4', 'chopped green onions': '1/4', 'Persian cucumbers, chopped': '4', 'cilantro, chopped': '2', 'Thai basil, chopped': '1/2', 'chopped roasted peanuts': '1/3', 'flour tortillas, warmed': '8-10', 'chili paste, for serving': 'seasoning', 'toasted sesame oil, for serving': 'seasoning'}
instructions: ['1. In a large skillet, cook the beef with black pepper over medium heat, breaking up the meat as it cooks until browned, about 5 minutes. Add the garlic, ginger, and Chinese 5 spice, cook another minute. Add the tamari and sweet Thai chili sauce. Bring the mixture to a simmer and cook until the sauce coats the beef, 3-5 minutes. Stir in 2 tablespoons of chopped green onions. remove from the heat.', '2. Place one tortilla at a time in the microwave for 15 seconds. Spoon the beef down the center, then top with cucumber, cilantro, basil, green onion, and peanuts. Fold the tortilla over the filling. Then fold the sides and ends of the tortillas over the filling and roll forward. Repeat with remaining ingredients.', '3. Serve warm with extra soy, chili paste, and toasted sesame oil for dipping. To make this a dinner, serve with rice on the side.']

title: Coconut Chicken Fingers with Bang Bang Sauce
ingredients: ['cornflakes', 'shredded unsweetened coconut', 'paprika', 'garlic powder', 'onion powder', 'sesame seeds', 'eggs, beaten', 'hot sauce or tamari (use preferred taste)', 'boneless chicken tenders', 'extra virgin olive oil, for brushing', 'mayo', 'sweet Thai chili sauce', 'coconut aminos (or tamari soy sauce)', 'hot sauce', 'rice viengar', 'small clove garlic, grated', 'lime zest']
ingredients with measurement: {'cornflakes': '2', 'shredded unsweetened coconut': '1 1/2', 'paprika': '1', 'garlic powder': '1/2', 'onion powder': '1/2', 'sesame seeds': '1/4', 'eggs, beaten': '2', 'hot sauce or tamari (use preferred taste)': '2', 'boneless chicken tenders': '2', 'extra virgin olive oil, for brushing': 'seasoning', 'mayo': '1/2', 'sweet Thai chili sauce': '1/3', 'coconut aminos (or tamari soy sauce)': '2', 'hot sauce': '1', 'rice viengar': '1', 'small clove garlic, grated': '1', 'lime zest': '2'}
instructions: ['1. Preheat the oven to 425° F. Line a baking sheet with parchment paper.', '2. In a food processor, combine the coconut, cornflakes, paprika, onion powder, garlic powder, and a pinch of salt. Pulse until you have fine crumbs. Mix in the sesame seeds. Dump the crumbs into a shallow bowl.', '3. Beat the eggs in a bowl and add the hot sauce. Add the chicken and toss well to coat.', '3. Dredge the chicken through the crumbs, covering fully. title: One Pot Broccoli Cheddar Chicken and Rice
ingredients: ['extra virgin olive oil', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'boneless chicken breasts, cut into cubes', 'yellow onion, chopped', 'salted butter', 'fresh thyme leaves', 'garlic powder', 'paprika', 'cayenne pepper, or to taste', 'basmati rice', 'dry broken spaghetti or orzo', 'low sodium chicken broth', 'broccoli florets, roughly chopped', 'whole milk or milk of choice', 'shredded cheddar cheese']
ingredients with measurement: {'extra virgin olive oil': '1', 'kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'boneless chicken breasts, cut into cubes': '1/2 – 1', 'yellow onion, chopped': '1', 'salted butter': '2', 'fresh thyme leaves': '2', 'garlic powder': '1/2', 'paprika': '1/2', 'cayenne pepper, or to taste': '1/4', 'basmati rice': '1 1/2', 'dry broken spaghetti or orzo': '1/2', 'low sodium chicken broth': '3', 'broccoli florets, roughly chopped': '3', 'whole milk or milk of choice': '3/4', 'shredded cheddar cheese': '1'}
instructions: ['1. In a large pot, set over medium heat, combine the olive oil, chicken, and onion. Cook until fragrant, about 5 minutes. Season with salt and pepper. title: Sheet Pan Spicy Ginger Sesame Beef and Broccoli

title: Sesame Chicken Schnitzel Bowls with Feta Tzatziki

ingredients with measurement: {'flour': '3/4', 'kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'Panko bread crumbs': '2', 'sesame seeds': '1', 'smoked paprika': '1', 'garlic powder': '2', 'onion powder': '1', 'cayenne pepper': '1/4', 'eggs, beaten': '3', 'chicken cutlets, or 3 boneless chicken breasts sliced in half horizontally': '4-6', 'avocado oil, for frying': 'seasoning', 'Persian cucumbers, chopped': '2', 'avocado, diced': '1', 'Serrano or jalapeño, seeded and chopped': '1', 'lemon juice': '2', 'fresh dill, chopped': '1/4', 'crumbled feta cheese': '6', 'Tzakiki sauce': '1-2', 'lettuce, peperoncini, and pitas, for serving': 'seasoning', 'garlic tahini, for serving': 'seasoning'}
instructions: ['1. Add the flour to a shallow dish. In a separate dish, combine the Panko, sesame seeds, salt, and pepper. Crack the eggs into a separate bowl, then beat.', '2. In a small bowl, combine the paprika, garlic powder, onion powder, cayenne, and a pinch of salt. Set the seasoning aside.', '3. Working in an assembly line, dredge the chicken through the flour, then the eggs – allow the excess to drip off into the bowl, then dip through the Panko crumbs. Place on a plate and repeat.', '4. Heat a few tablespoons of oil in a large skillet over medium-high. Add the chicken and cook until golden brown, 3-4 minutes. Flip the chicken and cook until golden brown on the other side, about 3-4 minutes. Transfer to a cutting board and immediately sprinkle on the seasoning, using to your taste. Thinly slice the chicken. Season with salt.', '5. In a bowl, toss the cucumbers, avocados, peppers, lemon juice, and dill. Add the feta and toss.', '6. To assemble, add lettuce and peperoncini to a bowl. Top with chicken, and cucumber/avocado salad. Add a few dollops of Tzaziki sauce. Drizzle over the tahini (homemade recipe in notes).']

title: Chili Crisp Chicken Tacos with Spicy Mango Salsa
ingredients: ['salted butter', 'garlic, chopped', 'chili flakes, to taste', 'sesame seeds', 'ground chicken', 'extra virgin olive oil', 'Thai red curry paste', 'tamari sauce or soy sauce', 'pickled ginger + 3 tablespoons of liquid in the jar', 'hard shell tacos', 'shredded Monterey or pepper jack cheese', 'mango, diced', 'Serrano or jalapeño pepper, seeded and sliced', 'fresh cilantro, chopped', 'fresh Thai basil or basil, chopped', 'green onions, chopped', 'lime juice', 'avocado', 'cilantro', 'honey']
ingredients with measurement: {'salted butter': '6', 'garlic, chopped': '3-4', 'chili flakes, to taste': '1-4', 'sesame seeds': '2', 'ground chicken': '1', 'extra virgin olive oil': '2', 'Thai red curry paste': '1/4', 'tamari sauce or soy sauce': '1/3', 'pickled ginger + 3 tablespoons of liquid in the jar': '1/3', 'hard shell tacos': '12', 'shredded Monterey or pepper jack cheese': '2', 'mango, diced': '1', 'Serrano or jalapeño pepper, seeded and sliced': '1', 'fresh cilantro, chopped': '1/2', 'fresh Thai basil or basil, chopped': '1/4', 'green onions, chopped': '2', 'lime juice': '1/4', 'avocado': '1', 'cilantro': '1/4', 'honey': '2'}
instructions: ['1. To make the chili crisp. In a small skillet melt together the butter, garlic, and a pinch of chili flakes. Cook until the butter begins to brown and the garlic crisps. Remove from the heat. Mix in the chili flakes and sesame seeds, transfer to a heat-proof bowl.', '2. In a large skillet, heat the olive oil and chicken, over medium heat. Cook the meat, breaking it up as it cooks, until the chicken is browned, about 5 minutes. Add the curry paste, soy sauce, and 1/3 cup water. Reduce the heat to medium and simmer until the sauce has thickened around the chicken, 5 minutes. Stir in the pickled ginger and a splash of the liquid in the jar. Cook until the ginger caramelizes, 2-3 minutes. Remove from the heat and stir in 2-3 tablespoons of the chili crisp sauce.', '3. Preheat the oven to 425° F. Line the taco shells up on a sheet pan. Bake 5 minutes. Evenly divide the meat among each taco shell and top with cheese. Bake 10 minutes, until the cheese has melted.', '4. Meanwhile, make the salsa by combining all ingredients in a bowl.', '5. To make the avocado crema, combine all ingredients in a blender and blend until smooth. Season with salt.', '6. Serve the tacos topped with avocado, salsa, and extra chili crisp.']

title: Creamy Sun-Dried Tomato Pasta with Melted Burrata
ingredients: ['roasted red peppers, drained', 'toasted nuts/seeds, walnuts, pumpkin, etc.', 'tomato paste', 'garlic, smashed', 'fresh basil, oregano, or parsley', 'extra-virgin olive oil', 'apple cider or champagne vinegar', 'honey', 'smoked paprika', 'cayenne pepper', 'salted butter', 'short cut pasta', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'oil packed sun-dried tomatoes, sliced', 'grated parmesan', 'fresh basil or mixed Italian herbs, chopped', 'chili flakes', 'burrata cheese, at room temperature']
ingredients with measurement: {'roasted red peppers, drained': '1', 'toasted nuts/seeds, walnuts, pumpkin, etc.': '1/3', 'tomato paste': '1', 'garlic, smashed': '2', 'fresh basil, oregano, or parsley': '1/4', 'extra-virgin olive oil': '1/2', 'apple cider or champagne vinegar': '1', 'honey': '2', 'smoked paprika': '2', 'cayenne pepper': '1/2-1', 'salted butter': '2', 'short cut pasta': '1', 'kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'oil packed sun-dried tomatoes, sliced': '1/2', 'grated parmesan': '1', 'fresh basil or mixed Italian herbs, chopped': '1', 'chili flakes': 'seasoning', 'burrata cheese, at room temperature': '2 or 3'}
instructions: ['1. To make the red pepper sauce. In a blender or food processor, combine the red peppers, reserving 1 whole pepper or about 1/3 of the jar for later, walnuts, tomato paste, garlic, herbs, olive oil, vinegar, honey, paprika, cayenne, and a generous pinch of salt. Blend until smooth, about 1 minute.', '2. Set a large pot with sides over medium-high heat. Add the butter, red pepper sauce, and 3 1/2 cups water. Bring to a boil, add the pasta, season with salt, and cook, stirring often, until the pasta is al dente, 8-12 minutes. Do not drain the pasta water. If needed, add additional water to help the pasta cook.', '4. Slice the reserved red pepper and stir in the pasta, sun-dried tomatoes, parmesan, and herbs. Toss until very creamy.', '5. Arrange the burrata in a serving bowl, pour the hot pasta and sauce over the burrata, then gently toss to allow the burrata to melt into the pasta. Serve the pasta topped with fresh parmesan and herbs. Enjoy!']

title: Basil Ranch Chicken and Bacon Quesadilla with Avocado

title: Sheet Pan Honey Buffalo Chicken with Broccoli
ingredients: ['chicken breasts or thighs, cut into cubes', 'smoked paprika', 'onion powder', 'garlic powder', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'flour or all-purpose gluten-free flour', 'extra virgin olive oil', 'broccoli florets', 'hot sauce', 'salted butter', 'seasoned salt', 'cayenne pepper', 'honey', 'blue cheese or ranch dressing, for serving', 'sliced green onions, or serving']
ingredients with measurement: {'chicken breasts or thighs, cut into cubes': '2', 'smoked paprika': '1', 'onion powder': '1', 'garlic powder': '1', 'kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'flour or all-purpose gluten-free flour': '1/4', 'extra virgin olive oil': '4', 'broccoli florets': '3', 'hot sauce': '1/2', 'salted butter': '6', 'seasoned salt': '1-2', 'cayenne pepper': '1/2', 'honey': '1/4', 'blue cheese or ranch dressing, for serving': 'seasoning', 'sliced green onions, or serving': 'seasoning'}
instructions: ['1. Preheat the oven to 450° F. Line a baking sheet with parchment paper or rub with oil.', '2. On the sheet pan, toss together the chicken, paprika, onion powder, garlic powder, salt, and pepper. Add the flour and toss again. Add 2 tablespoons olive oil, tossing to coat. Arrange the chicken to one side of the baking sheet. Add the broccoli to the other side. Toss with olive oil, salt, and pepper. Bake 15-20 minutes until the chicken is cooked through.', '3. Meanwhile, make the sauce. In a saucepan set over medium heat, melt together the hot sauce, butter, seasoned salt, and cayenne. Stir until melted and combined. Remove from the heat and mix in the honey.', '4. Remove the broccoli from the sheet pan. Then pour the buffalo sauce over the chicken, toss the chicken up in the sauce. Bake another 5 minutes, until the buffalo sauce is baked onto the chicken.', "5. Serve the chicken, broccoli, and buffalo sauce with green onions and blue cheese or ranch dressing. I love this over rice, but it's also great with french fries too!"]

title: Basil Chicken Fettuccine Alfredo with Prosciutto
ingredients: ['linguine or fettuccini', 'asparagus, cut into 1 inch pieces', 'extra virgin olive oil', 'chicken tenders, cubed', 'Italian seasoning', 'basil pesto', 'parmesan cheese', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'salted butter', 'garlic, chopped', 'chili flakes', 'low sodium chicken broth', 'heavy cream', 'thinly sliced prosciutto', 'fresh basil or micro basil, for serving']
ingredients with measurement: {'linguine or fettuccini': '1', 'asparagus, cut into 1 inch pieces': '1', 'extra virgin olive oil': '1', 'chicken tenders, cubed': '1', 'Italian seasoning': '2', 'basil pesto': '1/3', 'parmesan cheese': '1 1/2', 'kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'salted butter': '4', 'garlic, chopped': '2', 'chili flakes': 'seasoning', 'low sodium chicken broth': '1', 'heavy cream': '1', 'thinly sliced prosciutto': '3', 'fresh basil or micro basil, for serving': 'seasoning'}
instructions: ['1. Bring a large pot of salted water to a boil. Cook the pasta al dente, according to package directions. During the last 2-3 minutes of cooking add the asparagus. Drain.', '2. In a large skillet, toss together the chicken, with the olive oil, Italian seasoning, and a big pinch of pepper. Add 2 tablespoons butter, then set over medium-high heat. Cook the chicken until crisp, about 5-8 minutes. Stir in 2 tablespoons of pesto, then cook another 2 minutes. Add the prosciutto to the pan and cook 1 minute to warm through. Turn the heat off and transfer everything to a plate.', '3. To the same pan, add 2 tablespoons butter, the garlic, and chili flakes. Cook 1 minute, until fragrant, then pour in the broth and milk. Whisk until smooth. Bring the sauce to a gentle simmer and cook 5 minutes, until slightly thickened. Stir in the remaining pesto and the parmesan, then toss in the pasta and asparagus. Cook 2 minutes. Stir in the chicken. Remove from the heat and top with fresh basil .', '4. Serve immediately topped with prosciutto and greens.']

title: 20 Minute Garlic Oil Schezwan Peanut Noodles
ingredients: ['sesame or peanut oil', 'green onions or scallions', 'garlic', 'grated ginger', 'chili flakes, or Korean chili flakes', 'chopped fresh cilantro', 'brown rice ramen noodles', 'tamari or soy sauce', 'creamy peanut butter', 'tahini', 'honey or maple', 'chopped peanuts']

title: Pesto Chicken Tzatziki Salad Wraps
ingredients: ['full-fat plain Greek yogurt', 'extra virgin olive oil', 'boneless skinless chicken breasts or thighs', 'garlic, chopped', 'smoked paprika', 'chopped fresh oregano', 'chili flakes, Kosher salt, and black pepper', 'shredded lettuce', 'diced avocado', 'sliced peperoncini', 'fresh dill, chopped', 'crumbled feta cheese', 'large tortillas', 'basil pesto', 'Tzakiki sauce']
ingredients with measurement: {'full-fat plain Greek yogurt': '1/3', 'extra virgin olive oil': '1/4', 'boneless skinless chicken breasts or thighs': '1 1/2', 'garlic, chopped': '6', 'smoked paprika': '1', 'chopped fresh oregano': '1', 'chili flakes, Kosher salt, and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'shredded lettuce': '5', 'diced avocado': '3/4', 'sliced peperoncini': '1/3', 'fresh dill, chopped': '1/4', 'crumbled feta cheese': '1/2', 'large tortillas': '4-6', 'basil pesto': '1/2', 'Tzakiki sauce': '1-2'}
instructions: ['1. In a bowl, combine the yogurt, olive oil, chicken, garlic, paprika, oregano, chili flakes, and a large pinch each of salt and pepper. Let marinate for 15 minutes at room temperature or up to overnight in the refrigerator.', '2. Preheat the oven to 425° F. Arrange the chicken on a baking sheet. Bake 25 minutes, until cooked through. Switch the oven to broil. Broil 1-2 minutes, until the chicken chars on the edges. Thinly slice the chicken.', '3. Meanwhile, mix the lettuce, avocado, peperoncini, dill, and feta in a bowl.', '4. Place one tortilla at a time in the microwave for 20 seconds. Spread on a layer of pesto, then add the lettuce mix and the chicken. Spoon over some of the tzatziki. Fold the tortilla over the filling. Then fold the sides and ends of the tortillas over the filling and roll forward. Repeat with remaining ingredients.', '5. Serve at room temp or wrap in foil and warm in the oven. Enjoy with extra tzatziki sauce and garlic tahini, if desired.']

title: 25 Minute Banh Mi Rice Bowls

title: One Pan Spinach and Artichoke Orzo Bake
ingredients: ['extra virgin olive oil', 'garlic, chopped', 'shallot, chopped', 'fresh basil, chopped', 'paprika or smoked paprika', 'crushed Calabrian chili paste, or chili flakes, to taste', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'dry orzo pasta', 'marinated artichokes, quartered', 'basil pesto', 'baby spinach, chopped', 'shredded mozzarella cheese', 'shredded fontina cheese']

title: Sheet Pan Poblano Chicken Fajita Bowls

title: Broccoli Cheddar Noodle Soup
ingredients: ['extra virgin olive oil', 'salted butter', 'yellow onion, chopped', 'chopped carrots', 'all-purpose flour or gluten-free all-purpose flour', 'low sodium vegetable or chicken broth', 'milk', 'chopped broccoli florets', 'bay leaves', 'garlic powder', 'regular or smoked paprika', 'cayenne', 'grated nutmeg', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'shredded cheddar cheese', 'fresh thyme', 'egg noodles']
ingredients with measurement: {'extra virgin olive oil': '2', 'salted butter': '3', 'yellow onion, chopped': '1', 'chopped carrots': '1/2', 'all-purpose flour or gluten-free all-purpose flour': '1/4', 'low sodium vegetable or chicken broth': '3-4', 'milk': '2', 'chopped broccoli florets': '4', 'bay leaves': '2', 'garlic powder': '1', 'regular or smoked paprika': '1/2', 'cayenne': '1/4', 'grated nutmeg': '1/8', 'kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'shredded cheddar cheese': '3', 'fresh thyme': '2', 'egg noodles': '2-3'}
instructions: ['1. Melt the olive oil and butter together in a large soup pot set over medium heat. Add the onion and carrots and cook until softened, 5 minutes. Whisk in the flour and cook about 2 minutes, then gradually whisk in the broth, and then the milk.', '2. Add the broccoli, bay leaves, garlic powder, paprika, cayenne, nutmeg, and season with salt and pepper. Bring to a simmer, reduce the heat to medium, and cook, uncovered, until the broccoli is tender, about 10 minutes.', '3. Remove the soup from the stove. Remove and discard the bay leaves, then pour about half the soup into a blender or use an immersion blender.\xa0Return the soup to the stove and set over low heat. Stir in the cheese and thyme, cook until melted and creamy.', '4. Meanwhile, cook the noodles according to package directions.', '5. To serve, add the noodles to serving bowls, then pour the soup over the noodles and top with a little extra cheddar and fresh thyme. Enjoy!']

title: Spicy Tuscan Chicken Pasta
ingredients: ['oil-packed sun-dried tomatoes', 'boneless skinless chicken breasts, cubed', 'Italian seasoning', 'paprika or smoked paprika', 'red pepper flakes', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'grated parmesan cheese', 'salted butter', 'medium shallot, chopped', 'garlic, chopped', 'crushed Calabrian chili paste', 'short cut pasta', 'heavy cream', 'fresh baby spinach']
ingredients with measurement: {'oil-packed sun-dried tomatoes': '1', 'boneless skinless chicken breasts, cubed': '1', 'Italian seasoning': '4', 'paprika or smoked paprika': '1', 'red pepper flakes': 'seasoning', 'kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'grated parmesan cheese': '1', 'salted butter': '2', 'medium shallot, chopped': '1', 'garlic, chopped': '2', 'crushed Calabrian chili paste': '2-3', 'short cut pasta': '1', 'heavy cream': '1', 'fresh baby spinach': '2'}

Add the shallot, garlic, Calabrian chili paste, and 1 teaspoon of Italian seasoning. Cook until fragrant, about 3 minutes. Add 3 1/2 cups water. Slide the chicken in, and any juices left on the plate.', '4. Serve the pasta topped with fresh parmesan and basil.']

title: Crockpot Spicy Chicken Tortilla Soup

title: Spicy Chicken Yum Yum Rice Bowls
ingredients: ['boneless skinless chicken breasts or thighs, thinly sliced', 'cornstarch or arrowroot powder', 'tamari or soy sauce', 'extra virgin olive oil', 'black pepper', 'orange juice', 'honey', 'chili paste', 'chopped fresh ginger', 'garlic, chopped', 'cooked rice', 'cucumber, avocado, kimchi, and fried wontons – for serving', 'olive oil mayo', 'ketchup', 'Worcestershire sauce', 'seasoned salt', 'cayenne']

title: Crispy Cauliflower Tacos with Candied Jalapeño Pineapple Salsa
ingredients: ['extra virgin olive oil', 'chopped cauliflower florets', 'poblano pepper, chopped', 'yellow onion, chopped', 'chipotle chili powder', 'all-spice', 'ground ginger', 'cinnamon', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'red enchilada sauce', 'hard shell tacos', 'shredded Mexican cheese', 'avocado, shredded lettuce, and cilantro', 'diced pineapple', 'diced mango', 'cilantro, chopped', 'candied or pickled jalapeños', 'pickled ginger']
ingredients with measurement: {'extra virgin olive oil': '2', 'chopped cauliflower florets': '6', 'poblano pepper, chopped': '1', 'yellow onion, chopped': '1', 'chipotle chili powder': '2', 'all-spice': '1', 'ground ginger': '1/2', 'cinnamon': '1/4', 'kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'red enchilada sauce': '1/2', 'hard shell tacos': '12', 'shredded Mexican cheese': '1', 'avocado, shredded lettuce, and cilantro': 'seasoning', 'diced pineapple': '1', 'diced mango': '1', 'cilantro, chopped': '1/2', 'candied or pickled jalapeños': '1/2', 'pickled ginger': '2'}
instructions: ['1. Preheat the oven to 425° F.', '2. Heat the olive oil in a large skillet over high heat. Add the cauliflower, poblano pepper, and onion. Cook, stirring occasionally, until the cauliflower is soft, about 3 minutes. Add the chipotle chili powder, all-spice, ginger, cinnamon, and salt. Cook another 2 minutes, then pour in the enchilada sauce and 1/3 cup water. Reduce the heat to medium and simmer until the sauce has thickened slightly, about 5 minutes. Remove from the heat.', '3. Line the taco shells up on a sheet pan or in a 9×13 inch baking dish. Spoon the cauliflower into each taco shell and top with cheese. Bake 10 minutes, until the cheese has melted.', '4. Meanwhile, make the salsa. Combine all ingredients in a bowl. Season with salt.', '5. Serve the tacos topped with avocado, lettuce, cilantro, and lots of salsa. ENJOY!']

title: Calabrian Chili Roasted Red Pepper Pizza
ingredients: ['ball of pizza dough', 'sesame seeds, for sprinkling', 'marinara sauce', 'crushed Calabrian chili paste', 'roasted red peppers, drained and sliced', 'fish sauce', 'shredded mozzarella cheese', 'shredded provolone cheese', 'dried oregano', 'honey, for serving']
ingredients with measurement: {'ball of pizza dough': '1/3- 1/2', 'sesame seeds, for sprinkling': 'seasoning', 'marinara sauce': '1/3', 'crushed Calabrian chili paste': '2', 'roasted red peppers, drained and sliced': '1', 'fish sauce': '2', 'shredded mozzarella cheese': '3/4', 'shredded provolone cheese': '3/4', 'dried oregano': '1', 'honey, for serving': 'seasoning'}
instructions: ['1. Preheat the oven to 450° F.', "2. On a lightly floured surface, push the dough out until it's thin (about a 10-12 inch circle). Transfer the dough to a baking sheet. Lightly brush the crust with olive oil, then sprinkle with sesame seeds.", '3. Spread the marinara sauce and then the chili paste over the dough. Arrange the roasted red peppers on top. Add the fish sauce, if using, then sprinkle over the oregano. Add the mozzarella and provolone.', '4. Bake for 10-15 minutes or until the crust is golden and the cheese is bubbling. Remove from the oven and top with a pinch of dried oregano, then honey. Slice and enjoy!']

title: Sheet Pan Honey Mustard Salmon with Caesar Roasted Potatoes
ingredients: ['potatoes, cut into 1/2 inch chunks', 'brussels sprouts, halved', 'extra virgin olive oil', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'salmon fillets', 'honey', 'grainy dijon mustard', 'garlic, chopped', 'chili powder', 'cayenne', 'salted butter', 'extra virgin olive oil', 'tahini', 'lemon juice', 'dijon mustard', 'Worcestershire sauce', 'grated parmesan cheese, plus more for serving']
ingredients with measurement: {'potatoes, cut into 1/2 inch chunks': '1/2', 'brussels sprouts, halved': '1/2', 'extra virgin olive oil': '1/2', 'kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'salmon fillets': '4', 'honey': '2', 'grainy dijon mustard': '2', 'garlic, chopped': '2', 'chili powder': '1', 'cayenne': '1/2', 'salted butter': '3', 'tahini': '1/2', 'lemon juice': '1/4', 'dijon mustard': '1', 'Worcestershire sauce': '2', 'grated parmesan cheese, plus more for serving': '1/4'}
instructions: ['1. Preheat oven to 450° F. On a baking sheet, toss the potatoes and brussels sprouts with 2 tablespoons olive oil. Season with salt and pepper. Roast for 15 minutes, or until tender.', '2.\xa0Meanwhile, whisk together the honey, mustard, garlic, chili powder, cayenne, and 2 tablespoons olive oil. Season with salt. Place the salmon on a plate and spoon the sauce evenly overtop.', '3. Remove the vegetables from the oven. Add the salmon to the baking sheet. Add the butter to each filet.\xa0Bake for 10 minutes, or until the salmon reaches your desired doneness. During the last minute, switch the oven to broil and broil until lightly charred.\xa0Watch close.', '4. To make the dressing. Combine all ingredients in a blender and blend until smooth. Add 1/4 to 1/2 cup water to thin the dressing. Taste and adjust the salt.', '5. As soon as you pull everything out, drench the vegetables in dressing, then top with extra parmesan. Serve the salmon and any sauce left on the pan over the potatoes. Add more dressing. Enjoy!']

title: Crockpot White Chicken Chili Burrito Bowls
ingredients: ['boneless, skinless chicken breasts or thighs', 'medium yellow onion, chopped', 'poblano peppers, seeded and chopped', 'ground cumin', 'chili powder', 'smoked paprika', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'salsa verde', 'white beans, drained', 'shredded cheddar cheese', 'fresh cilantro, chopped', 'jalapeños or serrano peppers, sliced', 'cooked rice', 'shredded lettuce, avocado, green onion, and yogurt/sour cream, for serving', 'favorite salsa', 'lime zest and juice', 'tortilla chips, for serving']
ingredients with measurement: {'boneless, skinless chicken breasts or thighs': '1 1/2', 'medium yellow onion, chopped': '1', 'poblano peppers, seeded and chopped': '2', 'ground cumin': '2', 'chili powder': '1', 'smoked paprika': '1', 'kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'salsa verde': '2', 'white beans, drained': '1', 'shredded cheddar cheese': '1', 'fresh cilantro, chopped': '1/2', 'jalapeños or serrano peppers, sliced': '1-2', 'cooked rice': '4', 'shredded lettuce, avocado, green onion, and yogurt/sour cream, for serving': 'seasoning', 'favorite salsa': '1-2', 'lime zest and juice': 'seasoning', 'tortilla chips, for serving': 'seasoning'}
instructions: ['1. In the bowl of your crockpot, combine the chicken, onion, peppers, cumin, chili powder and paprika. Season well with salt and pepper. Pour over the salsa verde. Cover and cook on low for 5-6 hours or on high for 3-4 hours.', '2. Lightly shred the chicken. Stir in the beans, cheddar cheese, and cilantro. Cook until the cheese melts, 5 minutes.', '3. Serve the chicken and sauce over bowls of rice. Top, as desired, with lettuce, yogurt/sour cream, cheese, avocado, cilantro, jalapeños, and green onions. Drizzle over the salsa. Zest lime over each bowl. Eat and enjoy with plenty of chips on the side.']

title: Crispy Sesame Ginger Chicken Tacos
ingredients: ['boneless chicken breasts, cut into cubes', 'egg white', 'tamari or soy sauce', 'orange zest', 'cornstarch', 'sesame or olive oil, for drizzling', 'tamari or soy sauce', 'orange juice + 2 tablespoons zest', 'honey or maple syrup', 'chili paste', 'creamy peanut butter', 'garlic, chopped', 'fresh grated ginger', 'toasted sesame seeds', 'hard shell tacos', 'nori sheets, lettuce, kimchi, cilantro, green onion, and queso fresco or your favorite cheese, for serving', 'yum yum style sauce, for serving']
ingredients with measurement: {'boneless chicken breasts, cut into cubes': '1 1/2', 'egg white': '1', 'tamari or soy sauce': '1/2', 'orange zest': '1', 'cornstarch': '1/3', 'sesame or olive oil, for drizzling': 'seasoning', 'orange juice + 2 tablespoons zest': '1/3', 'honey or maple syrup': '2', 'chili paste': '1-3', 'creamy peanut butter': '2', 'garlic, chopped': '2-4', 'fresh grated ginger': '1', 'toasted sesame seeds': '2', 'hard shell tacos': '12', 'nori sheets, lettuce, kimchi, cilantro, green onion, and queso fresco or your favorite cheese, for serving': 'seasoning', 'yum yum style sauce, for serving': 'seasoning'}
instructions: ['1. Preheat the oven to 475° F. Line a baking sheet with parchment paper or grease with oil.', '2. In a bowl, combine the chicken, egg white, tamari/soy sauce, and orange zest. Toss well to coat. In a separate bowl, add the cornstarch.', '3. Dredge the chicken through the cornstarch to coat. Place the chicken on the prepared baking sheet. Drizzle with oil. Bake for 8 minutes. Flip the chicken and bake another 3-5 minutes, until the chicken is cooked through. Switch the oven to broil.', '4. Meanwhile, whisk together the tamari/soy sauce, orange juice, honey/maple, chili paste, peanut butter, garlic, and ginger. Pour the sauce over the chicken, then toss to coat. Sprinkle with sesame seeds. Broil 1-3 minutes, until the sauce begins to stick to the chicken and thicken.', '5. Stuff the nori into shells (if desired). Add the chicken, then top as desired. Serve with any extra sauce from the sheet pan and/or yum yum style sauce (homemade in notes).']

title: Crispy Cauliflower Tzatziki Bowls with Sweet Potato Fries
ingredients: ['extra virgin olive oil', 'cauliflower florets', 'garlic, chopped', 'shallots, chopped', 'smoked paprika', 'chili powder', 'dried oregano', 'ground turmeric', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'sweet potatoes, cut into matchsticks', 'seasoned salt (or paprika)', 'Persian cucumbers, chopped', 'avocado, diced', 'lemon juice', 'fresh dill, chopped', 'crumbled feta cheese', 'Tzatziki sauce', 'lettuce, peperoncini, and pitas, for serving']
ingredients with measurement: {'extra virgin olive oil': '6', 'cauliflower florets': '4', 'garlic, chopped': '6', 'shallots, chopped': '2', 'smoked paprika': '2', 'chili powder': '2', 'dried oregano': '2', 'ground turmeric': '1', 'kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'sweet potatoes, cut into matchsticks': '2', 'seasoned salt (or paprika)': '1', 'Persian cucumbers, chopped': '2', 'avocado, diced': '1', 'lemon juice': '2', 'fresh dill, chopped': '1/4', 'crumbled feta cheese': '6', 'Tzatziki sauce': '1-2', 'lettuce, peperoncini, and pitas, for serving': 'seasoning'}
instructions: ['1. Preheat oven to 425° F.', '2. On a baking sheet, combine the cauliflower, 4 tablespoons olive oil, garlic, shallots, paprika, chili powder, oregano, turmeric, and a pinch each of salt and pepper. Toss well to evenly coat. Transfer to the oven and roast for 15 minutes, or until tender. Toss and roast another 10 minutes, until lightly charred.', '3. Serve with pitas.']

title: BBQ Salmon Bowls with Mango Jalapeño Sauce
ingredients: ['salmon filets', 'extra virgin olive oil', 'honey or brown sugar', 'chili powder', 'smoked paprika', 'dried thyme', 'onion powder', 'kosher salt', 'garlic, chopped', 'salted butter', 'chili flakes', 'rice for, serving', 'diced mango', 'avocado, cubed', 'jalapeños, seeded – if desired, and chopped', 'cilantro, chopped', 'fresh basil, chopped', 'lime juice']
ingredients with measurement: {'salmon filets': '4', 'extra virgin olive oil': '1/4', 'honey or brown sugar': '1', 'chili powder': '2', 'smoked paprika': '2', 'dried thyme': '2', 'onion powder': '1', 'kosher salt': 'seasoning', 'garlic, chopped': '4', 'salted butter': '4', 'chili flakes': 'seasoning', 'rice for, serving': '3-4', 'diced mango': '1 1/2', 'avocado, cubed': '1', 'jalapeños, seeded – if desired, and chopped': '1-2', 'cilantro, chopped': '1/2', 'fresh basil, chopped': '1/2', 'lime juice': '2'}
instructions: ['1. Preheat the oven to 450° F.', '2. On a baking sheet, rub the salmon with olive oil, honey, chili powder, paprika, dried thyme, onion powder, and a pinch of salt.
