title: Greek Salmon with Lemon Feta and Orzo Summer Salad.
ingredients: ['salmon fillets', 'balsamic vinegar', 'smoked paprika', 'chopped fresh oregano (or 1 tablespoon dried oregano)', 'shallot, chopped', 'garlic, minced or grated', 'red pepper flakes, kosher salt, and black pepper', 'extra virgin olive oil', 'lemons, sliced and seeds removed - use to your taste', 'feta cheese, crumbled', 'fresh basil, dill, and or mint, chopped', 'cooked orzo', 'extra virgin olive oil', 'fresh basil, dill, and or chives, chopped', 'roasted red pepper, chopped', 'chickpeas', 'cherry tomatoes, halved', 'green olives', 'cucumber', 'avocado, diced']
ingredients with measurement: {'salmon fillets': '4', 'balsamic vinegar': '1', 'smoked paprika': '2', 'chopped fresh oregano (or 1 tablespoon dried oregano)': '2', 'shallot, chopped': '1', 'garlic, minced or grated': '4', 'red pepper flakes, kosher salt, and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'extra virgin olive oil': '1/3', 'lemons, sliced and seeds removed - use to your taste': '1-2', 'feta cheese, crumbled': '8', 'fresh basil, dill, and or mint, chopped': '1/2', 'cooked orzo': '3', 'fresh basil, dill, and or chives, chopped': '1', 'roasted red pepper, chopped': '1', 'chickpeas': '1', 'cherry tomatoes, halved': '2', 'green olives': '1/2', 'cucumber': '1/2', 'avocado, diced': '1'}
instructions: ['1. Place the salmon in a 9x13 inch baking dish. Add 3 tablespoons olive oil, the balsamic vinegar, paprika, oregano, shallot, garlic, and a pinch each of crushed red pepper, salt, and pepper. Rub the seasonings and oil evenly into flesh. Toss the lemon slices into the oil.', '2. To make the salad. Add the orzo, olive oil, juice of 1 lemon, herbs, and a pinch each of crushed red pepper flakes, salt, and pepper to a large serving bowl. Add the chickpeas, red peppers, tomatoes, olives, and avocado, toss to combine.', '3. Heat your grill, grill pan, or skillet to medium high heat. Place the salmon on the grill, skin side down. Add the lemon slices. Cover and cook until skin is lightly charred, 4-5 minutes, flip the salmon and lemons, grill another 3-4 minutes until opaque. Remove everything from the grill.', '4. Finely chop the lemon slices and mix them with the herbs, crumbled feta, and 3 tablespoons olive oil. Add a couple of spoonfuls of the feta to the orzo salad.', '5. Divide the salad between plates. Add the salmon and sprinkle with lemon feta. Top with lots of fresh herbs, and an extra squeeze of lemon, if desired. Enjoy!']

title: Mac and Cheese Stuffed Oven Fried Zucchini Bites
ingredients: ['elbow pasta', 'salted butter', 'all-purpose flour', 'whole milk', 'shredded sharp cheddar cheese', 'shredded fontina cheese', 'shredded havarti cheese', 'mustard powder', 'cayenne pepper', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'panko bread crumbs', 'grated parmesan cheese', 'paprika', 'large eggs, beaten', 'medium zucchini, cut into 1/4 inch rounds', 'extra virgin olive oil, for drizzling']
ingredients with measurement: {'elbow pasta': '1/2', 'salted butter': '2', 'all-purpose flour': '4', 'whole milk': '1 1/2', 'shredded sharp cheddar cheese': '1 1/4', 'shredded fontina cheese': '1/2', 'shredded havarti cheese': '1/2', 'mustard powder': '1/4', 'cayenne pepper': '1/4', 'kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'panko bread crumbs': '1 1/2', 'grated parmesan cheese': '1', 'paprika': '1/2', 'large eggs, beaten': '3', 'medium zucchini, cut into 1/4 inch rounds': '2-3', 'extra virgin olive oil, for drizzling': 'seasoning'}
instructions: ['1. In a large saucepan, melt the butter over medium heat. Whisk in 2 tablespoons flour. Reduce the heat to medium-low and cook for 1 minute, stirring to avoid burning—it will bubble. Gradually whisk in the milk and 1 cup of water, then stir in the macaroni. Increase the heat to medium-high and bring the mixture to a boil. Stir frequently until the macaroni is just al dente, 8 to 10 minutes. If the sauce thicken too quickly, add 1/2 additional water.', '2. When the macaroni is al dente, remove the pan from the heat and stir in the cheddar, fontina, Havarti, mustard, and cayenne. Season with salt and pepper. Stir until the cheeses have fully melted. Let cool. Transfer to the fridge to chill 2 hours or place in the freezer 30-45 minutes, until cold.', '3. Preheat the oven to 425 degrees F. Line 2 baking sheets with parchment paper.', '4. Place the panko, parmesan, 2 tablespoons flour, and the paprika in a shallow bowl. Add the eggs to a separate bowl. Scoop out 1 tablespoon of mac and cheese and pack it into a ball. Sandwich the mac and cheese between 2 zucchini slices, secure with 2 toothpicks.', '5. Dredge the stuffed zucchini bites through the egg, and then through the panko mix, tossing to coat entirely. Place onto the prepared baking sheet. Repeat until all the bites are breaded. Make sure not to crowd your pans.', "6. Brush/drizzling the bites with olive oil. Transfer to the oven and bake for 15-20 minutes or until golden and crisp. Some of the bite may break in half, it's OK, they will still be delicious. Serve while hot with your favorite dipping sauces and or fresh herbs."]

title: 20 Minute Florentine Butter Chicken with Burst Cherry Tomatoes
ingredients: ['large egg, beaten', 'all-purpose flour', 'boneless skinless chicken breast cutlets', 'kosher salt and pepper', 'cold salted butter, cubed', 'extra virgin olive oil', 'cherry tomatoes', 'garlic, smashed', 'fresh chopped thyme', 'crushed red pepper flakes', 'buffalo or regular mozzarella, torn', 'fresh lemon juice', 'fresh basil, torn']
ingredients with measurement: {'large egg, beaten': '1', 'all-purpose flour': '1/4', 'boneless skinless chicken breast cutlets': '4', 'kosher salt and pepper': 'seasoning', 'cold salted butter, cubed': '10', 'extra virgin olive oil': '4', 'cherry tomatoes': '2 1/2', 'garlic, smashed': '4', 'fresh chopped thyme': '2', 'crushed red pepper flakes': '1', 'buffalo or regular mozzarella, torn': '4', 'fresh lemon juice': '3', 'fresh basil, torn': '1/2'}
instructions: ['1. Preheat the broiler. Place the egg and flour in separate shallow bowls.', '2. Season the chicken with salt and pepper. Dredge both sides of the chicken through the egg, and then through the flour, tossing to coat. Place the chicken on a plate.', '3. In an oven safe skillet set over medium heat, add 2 tablespoons olive oil. When the oil shimmers, add the tomatoes, garlic, 1 tablespoon thyme, and a pinch each of salt, pepper, and red pepper flakes. Cook until the tomatoes begin to pop, about 4-5 minutes. Turn off the heat and transfer the tomatoes to a plate.', '4. In the same skillet, melt together 4 tablespoons butter and 2 tablespoons olive oil. When the oil shimmers, add the chicken and cook until the bottom side is golden brown, about 3-4 minutes. Flip the chicken and add 6 tablespoons butter and 1 tablespoon thyme, swirling the butter around the chicken. Cook, basting the chicken in butter until the chicken is cooked and golden brown, about 4 to 5 minutes.', '5. Remove from the heat, add the mozzarella around the chicken. Spoon the tomatoes and lemon juice over top. Transfer to the oven, broil 1 minute, until the cheese is melted. Serve topped with lots of fresh basil. Enjoy!']

title: 20 Minute Lemon Butter Pasta with Ricotta and Spicy Breadcrumbs
ingredients: ['extra virgin olive oil', 'Panko breadcrumbs', 'drained capers', 'crushed red pepper flakes', 'angel hair pasta', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'cold salted butter', 'lemon, sliced, seeds removed', 'fresh basil, chopped', 'zucchini or yellow summer squash, very thinly sliced', 'garlic, minced or grated', 'fresh thyme leaves', 'ricotta cheese, whipped, if desired']
ingredients with measurement: {'extra virgin olive oil': '2', 'Panko breadcrumbs': '1', 'drained capers': '2', 'crushed red pepper flakes': '1/2-1', 'angel hair pasta': '3/4', 'kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'cold salted butter': '6', 'lemon, sliced, seeds removed': '1', 'fresh basil, chopped': '1', 'zucchini or yellow summer squash, very thinly sliced': '1', 'garlic, minced or grated': '3-4', 'fresh thyme leaves': '2', 'ricotta cheese, whipped, if desired': '8'}
instructions: ['1. Heat a large skillet over medium heat. Add the olive oil, the breadcrumbs, capers, and crushed red pepper flakes. Cook, stirring occasionally until the breadcrumbs are toasted all over and the capers fried, about 4 minutes. Remove the breadcrumbs from the skillet. Season with salt.', '2. Bring a large pot of salted water to a boil. Cook the pasta according to package directions until al dente. Drain.', '3. Meanwhile, set your skillet over medium-high heat. Add the 2 tablespoons butter and lemon slices. Sear until the lemon is caramelized, about 1 minute per side. Remove the lemon from the skillet. Finely chop the lemon slices and mix with the basil.', '4. To the skillet, add the remaining butter, zucchini, garlic, and thyme. Season with salt and pepper. Cook until the zucchini is golden, 5 minutes. Watch the garlic closely. Remove from the heat, stir in the pasta and 1/2 of the lemon/basil.', '5. Spread the ricotta into bowls. Add the pasta. Top with breadcrumbs and additional lemon/basil. Twirl the pasta up with the cheese. EAT and ENJOY.']

title: Crispy BBQ Beer Battered Cauliflower Nuggets
ingredients: ['large head cauliflower, cut into florets', 'all-purpose flour', 'smoked paprika', 'cayenne pepper, using more or less to your taste', 'baking powder', 'kosher salt', 'of your favorite beer, or use sparkling water', 'oil for frying', 'of your favorite BBQ sauce, plus more for serving', 'dijon mustard', 'honey', 'sour cream, plain Greek yogurt, or olive oil based mayo', 'juice of 1/2 a lemon', 'BBQ or Cajun seasoning', 'cayenne pepper', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'ketchup', 'honey', 'molasses', 'apple cider vinegar', 'Worcestershire sauce', 'Dijon mustard', 'smoked paprika', 'garlic powder', 'onion powder', 'cayenne pepper', 'kosher salt', 'pepper']
ingredients with measurement: {'large head cauliflower, cut into florets': '1', 'all-purpose flour': '3/4', 'smoked paprika': '1', 'cayenne pepper, using more or less to your taste': '1/2-1', 'baking powder': '1', 'kosher salt': '1 1/2', 'of your favorite beer, or use sparkling water': '3/4', 'oil for frying': 'seasoning', 'of your favorite BBQ sauce, plus more for serving': '3/4', 'dijon mustard': '1/4', 'honey': '3/4', 'sour cream, plain Greek yogurt, or olive oil based mayo': '1/4', 'juice of 1/2 a lemon': 'seasoning', 'BBQ or Cajun seasoning': '1', 'cayenne pepper': '1/2', 'kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'ketchup': '1 1/4', 'molasses': '1/4', 'apple cider vinegar': '1/4', 'Worcestershire sauce': '1', 'Dijon mustard': '1', 'garlic powder': '1', 'onion powder': '1', 'pepper': '1'}
instructions: ['1. In a large bowl, mix the flour, paprika, cayenne, baking powder, and a pinch of salt. Add the beer, mixing until just combined. Add the cauliflower and toss well to evenly coat all the florets.', '2. To Fry: Heat 1-2 inches of oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Fry the cauliflower in batches for 4-5 minutes or until golden and crisp on all sides. Remove and drain on a wire rack with paper towels underneath. This will keep the cauliflower crisp.', "3. To Bake: Preheat the oven to 450 degrees F. Rub a baking sheet with olive oil. Spread the cauliflower in an even layer on the prepared baking sheet. title: Spicy Coconut Basil Chicken Curry with Garden Vegetables.
ingredients: ['boneless skinless chicken thighs or breasts, thinly sliced', 'yellow curry powder', 'ground turmeric', 'cayenne pepper', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'sesame oil or extra virgin olive oil', 'zucchini or summer squash, diced', 'sweet corn, kernels removed from the cob', 'medium shallots, chopped', 'garlic, minced or grated', 'fresh ginger, grated', 'crushed red pepper flakes', 'coconut milk', 'juice and zest from 1/2 a lemon', 'fresh cilantro, chopped', 'fresh basil, roughly torn', 'cooked basmati rice', 'toasted sesame seeds']
ingredients with measurement: {'boneless skinless chicken thighs or breasts, thinly sliced': '1', 'yellow curry powder': '1 1/2', 'ground turmeric': '1', 'cayenne pepper': '1/4-1/2', 'kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'sesame oil or extra virgin olive oil': '3', 'zucchini or summer squash, diced': '2', 'sweet corn, kernels removed from the cob': '2', 'medium shallots, chopped': '2-3', 'garlic, minced or grated': '2', 'fresh ginger, grated': '1', 'crushed red pepper flakes': '1', 'coconut milk': '1', 'juice and zest from 1/2 a lemon': 'seasoning', 'fresh cilantro, chopped': '1/4', 'fresh basil, roughly torn': '1/4', 'cooked basmati rice': '2', 'toasted sesame seeds': 'seasoning'}
instructions: ['1. In a medium bowl, toss together the chicken, curry powder, turmeric, cayenne, 1 tablespoon oil, and a pinch each of salt and pepper.', '2. Heat the remaining 2 tablespoons of oil in a large skillet over medium heat. When the oil shimmers, add the chicken and brown all over, about 5 minutes. Add the zucchini, corn, shallots, garlic, and ginger. Season with crushed red pepper flakes, salt, and pepper. Cook the veggies another 5-10 minutes or until they just begin to soften.', '3. Stir in the coconut milk and 1/3-1/2 cup water. Stir to combine, bring the mixture to a simmer over medium heat, cook 5-10 minutes or until the sauce thickens slightly. If the sauce thickens too much, add additional water to thin. Remove from the heat and stir in the lemon juice and zest, cilantro, and basil.', '4. To serve, divide the rice among bowls and spoon the curry overtop. Top with sesame seeds and fresh herbs. Enjoy!']

title: 25 Minute Korean Bulgogi BBQ Chicken with Spicy Garlic Butter Corn

title: Chipotle BBQ Shrimp Tacos with Creamy Ranch Slaw.

title: Garden Greens Goddess Pizza.

instructions: ['1. Preheat the oven to 450 degrees F. Grease a large baking sheet with olive oil.', '2. Make the pesto, if using homemade. title: Skillet Cheesy Pizza Chicken
ingredients: ['plain Greek yogurt or buttermilk', 'Panko bread crumbs', 'shredded parmesan cheese', 'boneless skinless chicken breasts', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'dry mozzarella cheese, torn', 'fresh basil, plus more for serving', 'extra virgin olive oil', 'garlic, minced or grated', 'dried oregano', 'crushed red pepper flakes', 'tomato paste', 'vodka', 'fresh cherry tomatoes', 'pepperoni']
ingredients with measurement: {'plain Greek yogurt or buttermilk': '1/4', 'Panko bread crumbs': '1 1/3', 'shredded parmesan cheese': '2/3', 'boneless skinless chicken breasts': '2', 'kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'dry mozzarella cheese, torn': '8', 'fresh basil, plus more for serving': '1/2', 'extra virgin olive oil': '4', 'garlic, minced or grated': '2', 'dried oregano': '2', 'crushed red pepper flakes': '1', 'tomato paste': '2', 'vodka': '1/2', 'fresh cherry tomatoes': '2 1/2', 'pepperoni': '3'}
instructions: ['1. Preheat the oven to 425 degrees F. Place the yogurt in shallow bowl. Add the Panko and parmesan to a separate shallow bowl. Season the crumbs with salt and pepper.', '2. Slice the chicken through the middle horizontally to within a 1/2 inch of the other side. Open the two sides and spread them out like an open book.\xa0Layer a handful of mozzarella on 1 side, then place a basil leaf over the cheese. Close the chicken sides like a book, covering the filling (see above photos). Dredge both sides of the chicken through the yogurt and then through the Panko, pressing gently to adhere. Place the chicken on a plate.', '3. Heat 2 tablespoons of oil in a large skillet over medium-high. When the oil shimmers, add the chicken and cook until the bottom side is golden brown, about 3-4 minutes. Carefully flip the chicken and cook until golden brown on the other side, 3-4 minutes. Serve the chicken topped with the remaining cherry tomatoes and fresh basil. Enjoy!']

title: 30 Minute Sticky Thai Meatballs with Sesame Noodles
ingredients: ['cornstarch', 'low sodium soy sauce', 'rice vinegar', 'honey', 'sambal oelek', 'zest and juice of 1 lime, plus more for serving', 'ground chicken, pork, or turkey', 'fresh ginger, grated', 'garlic, minced or grated', 'black pepper', 'extra-virgin olive oil', 'medium shallots, sliced or chopped', 'red or orange bell peppers, chopped', 'raw peanuts', 'fresh basil and or cilantro, roughly torn', 'rice noodles', 'toasted sesame seeds', 'diced mango or mango chili sauce, for serving']
ingredients with measurement: {'cornstarch': '1', 'low sodium soy sauce': '1/3', 'rice vinegar': '2', 'honey': '2', 'sambal oelek': '2-3', 'zest and juice of 1 lime, plus more for serving': 'seasoning', 'ground chicken, pork, or turkey': '1', 'fresh ginger, grated': '1', 'garlic, minced or grated': '2', 'black pepper': 'seasoning', 'extra-virgin olive oil': '3', 'medium shallots, sliced or chopped': '2', 'red or orange bell peppers, chopped': '2', 'raw peanuts': '1/4', 'fresh basil and or cilantro, roughly torn': '1/2', 'rice noodles': '8', 'toasted sesame seeds': '1', 'diced mango or mango chili sauce, for serving': '1'}
instructions: ['1. In a glass jar, whisk together 1/3 cup cold water and the cornstarch. Add the soy sauce, rice vinegar, honey, chili paste, lime zest, and lime juice.', '2. Add the chicken, ginger, garlic, and a pinch of pepper to a bowl. Mix until combined. Coat your hands with a bit of oil, and roll the meat into tablespoon-size balls (will make 15-20 meatballs).', '3. Heat a large skillet over medium-high heat and add 2 tablespoons oil. When the oil shimmers, add the meatballs and sear until crisp, about 4-5 minutes, turning them 2-3 times. Remove the meatballs from the skillet. To the skillet, add the shallots, peppers, and peanuts, cook another 2-3 minutes, until the peppers begin to char. Pour in the honey/soy sauce mix. Add back the meatballs. Bring the sauce to a boil over medium-high heat and cook until the sauce thickens slightly, about 5 minutes. Remove from the heat and stir in the basil.', '4. Meanwhile, cook rice noodles according to packaged directions. Drain and toss with a couple drizzles of olive oil and the sesame seeds.', '5. To serve, divide the noodles among bowls and top with meatballs. Serve with additional herbs, limes, and mango chili sauce (if desired). Enjoy']

title: Cauliflower Gnocchi with Crispy Zucchini and Whipped Goat Cheese
ingredients: ['extra virgin olive oil', 'Panko breadcrumbs', 'garlic, finely chopped or grated', 'freshly grated parmesan cheese', 'fresh basil, finely chopped', 'cauliflower or potato gnocchi, homemade or store-bought', 'medium shallots, thinly sliced', 'zucchini or yellow summer squash, thinly sliced', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'salted butter', 'fresh thyme leaves', 'lemon zest and 1 tablespoon juice', 'crushed red pepper flakes', 'goat cheese or feta cheese', 'fresh basil, dill, and or chives, for serving', 'cauliflower florets', 'all-purpose flour, use more as needed', 'grated parmesan cheese', 'kosher salt']
ingredients with measurement: {'extra virgin olive oil': '4', 'Panko breadcrumbs': '1', 'garlic, finely chopped or grated': '2', 'freshly grated parmesan cheese': '1/2', 'fresh basil, finely chopped': '1/2', 'cauliflower or potato gnocchi, homemade or store-bought': '1', 'medium shallots, thinly sliced': '2', 'zucchini or yellow summer squash, thinly sliced': '2', 'kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'salted butter': '2', 'fresh thyme leaves': '2', 'lemon zest and 1 tablespoon juice': '1', 'crushed red pepper flakes': '1', 'goat cheese or feta cheese': '8', 'fresh basil, dill, and or chives, for serving': 'seasoning', 'cauliflower florets': '4-5', 'all-purpose flour, use more as needed': '3/4-1', 'grated parmesan cheese': '3/4', 'kosher salt': '1'}
instructions: ['1. Heat a large skillet over medium heat. Add 2 tablespoons olive oil, the garlic, the breadcrumbs, and basil. Cook, stirring occasionally until the breadcrumbs are toasted all over, about 3 minutes. Add the cheese and cook another 2 minutes, until fried. Remove the breadcrumbs from the skillet. Season with salt and pepper. Set the breadcrumbs aside.', '2. Bring a large pot of salted water to a boil. Boil the gnocchi until they float to the top and are cooked through, about 3-4 minutes. Drain.', '3. Place the skillet back over medium heat. Add the remaining 1/4 cup olive oil and the shallots. Cook until the shallots begin to caramelize, about 5 minutes.\xa0Add the zucchini and season with salt and pepper. Cook, stirring occasionally until the zucchini has caramelized and is golden brown, 5-8 minutes. Add the butter, the thyme, lemon zest, and red pepper flakes. Cook until the butter begins to brown, 3-4 minutes.\xa0Drop the gnocchi into the sauce, gently tossing to combine. Remove from the heat.', '4. To make the goat cheese, combine the goat cheese, 2 tablespoons olive oil, and the lemon juice in a food processor and pulse until smooth and creamy. The cheese can be kept in the fridge for up to 3 days.', '5. Spread the goat cheese into the bottom of each individual serving bowl. Spoon the gnocchi and sauce over the cheese. Top with breadcrumbs and herbs. Scoop the gnocchi up with the goat cheese and the sauce. EAT and ENJOY.']

title: Coconut Popcorn Chicken with Sweet Thai Chili Lime Sauce
ingredients: ['dijon mustard', 'plain Greek yogurt, sour cream, or olive oil mayo', 'boneless chicken breasts, cut into 2 inch cubes', 'shredded unsweetened coconut', 'Panko breadcrumbs', 'paprika', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'extra virgin olive oil, for brushing', 'sweet Thai chili sauce', 'ketchup', 'garlic, grated', 'zest and juice from 1 lime, plus more for serving', 'creamy honey mustard, for serving']
ingredients with measurement: {'dijon mustard': '1', 'plain Greek yogurt, sour cream, or olive oil mayo': '1/4', 'boneless chicken breasts, cut into 2 inch cubes': '2', 'shredded unsweetened coconut': '1 1/2', 'Panko breadcrumbs': '1/2', 'paprika': '1/2', 'kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'extra virgin olive oil, for brushing': 'seasoning', 'sweet Thai chili sauce': '1/4', 'ketchup': '2', 'garlic, grated': '1-2', 'zest and juice from 1 lime, plus more for serving': 'seasoning', 'creamy honey mustard, for serving': 'seasoning'}
instructions: ['1. In a bowl, whisk together the mustard and yogurt. Add the chicken and toss well to coat.', '2. Preheat the oven to 425 degrees F. Line a baking sheet with parchment.', '3. Add the coconut, Panko, paprika, and a pinch each of salt and pepper to a medium-sized bowl. Stir to combine.', '4. Remove each piece of chicken from the mustard mix, and dredge through the crumbs, pressing gently to adhere. Place on the prepared baking sheet. Repeat until all the chicken has been used. Make sure not to crowd your pan, if necessary use two baking sheets. Lightly brush/drizzle the chicken with olive oil. Transfer to the oven and bake for 15-20 minutes or until the chicken is cooked through.', '5. Meanwhile, make the chili sauce. Combine all ingredients in a bowl.', '6. Serve the chicken topped with flaky salt, fresh cilantro, limes, and the Sweet Thai Chili Lime Sauce for dipping. Add creamy honey mustard for a little double-dip. Enjoy!']

title: One Skillet French Onion Tater Tot Casserole
ingredients: ['salted butter', 'extra virgin olive oil', 'medium yellow onions, thinly sliced', 'dry white wine, such as Pinot Grigio or Sauvignon Blanc', 'lean ground turkey, chicken, or beef', 'garlic, minced or grated', 'red bell peppers, chopped', 'fresh thyme leaves', 'fresh chopped parsley', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'all-purpose flour', 'low sodium soy sauce', 'Worcestershire sauce', 'cayenne pepper', 'shredded Gruyere cheese', 'frozen tater tots', 'shredded cheddar cheese', 'fresh chives, for topping']
ingredients with measurement: {'salted butter': '2', 'extra virgin olive oil': '2', 'medium yellow onions, thinly sliced': '2-3', 'dry white wine, such as Pinot Grigio or Sauvignon Blanc': '1', 'lean ground turkey, chicken, or beef': '1', 'garlic, minced or grated': '2', 'red bell peppers, chopped': '2', 'fresh thyme leaves': '2', 'fresh chopped parsley': '2', 'kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'all-purpose flour': '2', 'low sodium soy sauce': '1/4', 'Worcestershire sauce': '1', 'cayenne pepper': '1/4', 'shredded Gruyere cheese': '1', 'frozen tater tots': '2', 'shredded cheddar cheese': '1', 'fresh chives, for topping': 'seasoning'}
instructions: ['1. Preheat the oven to 425 degrees F.', "2. In a large oven safe skillet, melt the butter, olive oil, and onions together. Cook, stirring occasionally until softened, about 5 minutes. At this point, you want to slowly add 1/2 cup of the wine, 1/4 cup at a time, until the wine cooks into the onions. Continue to cook another 8-10 minutes until you've used the 1/2 cup of wine and the onions are deeply caramelized. Push the onions to the side of the pan and stir in the meat, bell pepper, garlic, thyme, parsley, cayenne, and season with salt and pepper. Cook, breaking up the meat as it cooks, another 5 minutes until the meat is browned. Stir in the flour and cook another minute. Add the remaining 1/2 cup wine, soy sauce, Worcestershire sauce, and 1 cup of water. Bring to a boil and simmer until thickened 3-5 minutes.", '3. Remove from the heat and sprinkle the Gruyere cheese overtop the meat. Arrange the tater tots on top of the cheese. Transfer to the oven and bake 20 minutes, until the tots are golden. Sprinkle the cheddar over the tater tots, return to the oven. Bake another 10-15 minutes, until the cheese is melted.', '4. Serve topped as desired with fresh thyme and chives.']

title: Artichoke and Broccoli Pesto Brie Panini with Thyme Honey.
ingredients: ['marinated jarred artichokes', 'chopped broccoli florets', 'plain Greek yogurt', 'shredded fontina or mozzarella cheese', 'fresh thyme leaves', 'fresh chopped oregano', 'crushed red pepper flakes', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'basil pesto', 'Brie, rind left on, and sliced', 'extra virgin olive oil', 'challah, sourdough, or ciabatta bread', 'honey']
ingredients with measurement: {'marinated jarred artichokes': '1', 'chopped broccoli florets': '1', 'plain Greek yogurt': '1/3', 'shredded fontina or mozzarella cheese': '1/2', 'fresh thyme leaves': '2', 'fresh chopped oregano': '1', 'crushed red pepper flakes': '1/4', 'kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'basil pesto': '3/4', 'Brie, rind left on, and sliced': '6', 'extra virgin olive oil': 'seasoning', 'challah, sourdough, or ciabatta bread': '8', 'honey': '1/4'}
instructions: ['1. In a medium bowl, combine the artichokes, broccoli, yogurt, fontina cheese, thyme, oregano, red pepper flakes, and a pinch each of salt and pepper.', '2. Rub the outsides of the bread generously with olive oil. Spread the basil pesto on the inside of each piece of bread. Evenly layer the brie and artichoke/broccoli mix. Drizzle honey over top and sprinkle with black pepper. Add the top piece of bread.', '3. Heat a panini press or large skillet over medium-high heat. Place the sandwiches, one at a time, into the panini press and cook until the cheese is melted. Alternately, you can cook the sandwiches in a skillet as you would a grilled cheese.', '4. title: Crockpot Carne Asada Tacos with Cilantro Lime Garlic Sauce
ingredients: ['flank steak', 'garlic, minced or grated', 'chipotle chili powder', 'onion powder', 'smoked paprika', 'kosher salt', 'extra virgin olive oil', 'zest and juice of 1 lime', 'Mexican beer, such as Negra Modelo', 'honey', 'warmed corn or flour tortillas,', 'avocado, feta cheese, jalapeños, pickled onion, and shredded lettuce, for serving', 'potatoes, cut into ¼-inch-thick matchsticks', 'extra virgin olive oil', 'chipotle chili powder', 'smoked paprika', 'garlic powder', 'kosher salt', 'zest and juice of 1 lime', 'garlic, grated', 'plain Greek yogurt or sour cream', 'fresh cilantro, finely chopped', 'green onions, finely chopped']
ingredients with measurement: {'flank steak': '2', 'garlic, minced or grated': '4', 'chipotle chili powder': '1', 'onion powder': '2', 'smoked paprika': '1', 'kosher salt': 'seasoning', 'extra virgin olive oil': '3', 'zest and juice of 1 lime': 'seasoning', 'Mexican beer, such as Negra Modelo': '1/2', 'honey': '1', 'warmed corn or flour tortillas,': 'seasoning', 'avocado, feta cheese, jalapeños, pickled onion, and shredded lettuce, for serving': 'seasoning', 'potatoes, cut into ¼-inch-thick matchsticks': '4', 'garlic powder': '1', 'garlic, grated': '1-2', 'plain Greek yogurt or sour cream': '1/2', 'fresh cilantro, finely chopped': '1/2', 'green onions, finely chopped': '2'}
instructions: ['1. In the bowl of your slow cooker, combine the steak, garlic, chili powder, onion powder, paprika, pinch of salt, olive oil, lime juice and zest. Rub the seasonings into the steak. Add the beer. Cover and cook on low for 6 hours or on high for 3-4 hours.', '2. Preheat the broiler to high. Remove the steak from the sauce to a baking sheet. Let rest 10 minutes. Lightly shred. Add 1/2 cup of the cooking liquid, then drizzle on the honey. Transfer to the broiler. Broil for 2-5 minutes, until the streak caramelizes. Watch closely! Toss with additional cooking liquid, if desired.', '3. Meanwhile, make the fries. Preheat the oven to 425 degrees F.', '4. Place the potatoes on a large baking sheet and toss with olive oil, chili powder, paprika, garlic powder, and a large pinch of salt. Spread the fries in an even layer. Do not overcrowd the pan, if needed, divide the fries between 2 baking sheets. Transfer to the oven and bake for 15-20 minutes, then flip and bake for 15 minutes more.', '5. To make the sauce. Combine all ingredients in a bowl and mix until combined. Season with salt.', '6. Stuff the carne asada into the warmed tortillas. Top as desired with cilantro, lettuce, avocado, fries, cheese, and additional sauce. Enjoy!']

title: Lebanese Chicken with Charred Lemon Cauliflower.
ingredients: ['extra virgin olive oil', 'tomato paste', 'smoked paprika', 'garlic, minced or grated', 'zest and juice of 1/2 a lemon', 'crushed red pepper flakes', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'boneless skinless chicken breasts, cut into bite size chunks', 'large head of cauliflower, cut into florets', 'extra virgin olive oil', 'lemons, 1 quartered, 1 juiced', 'fresh parsley, cilantro, and or dill, chopped', 'green olives, roughly chopped', 'red wine vinegar', 'Persian cucumbers, chopped', 'toasted pumpkin seeds and/or sunflower seeds', 'plain Greek yogurt', 'garlic, grated']
ingredients with measurement: {'extra virgin olive oil': '2', 'tomato paste': '2', 'smoked paprika': '2', 'garlic, minced or grated': '6', 'zest and juice of 1/2 a lemon': 'seasoning', 'crushed red pepper flakes': '1', 'kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'boneless skinless chicken breasts, cut into bite size chunks': '2', 'large head of cauliflower, cut into florets': '1', 'lemons, 1 quartered, 1 juiced': '2', 'fresh parsley, cilantro, and or dill, chopped': '1', 'green olives, roughly chopped': '1/2', 'red wine vinegar': '2', 'Persian cucumbers, chopped': '2', 'toasted pumpkin seeds and/or sunflower seeds': '1/2', 'plain Greek yogurt': '1', 'garlic, grated': '1-2'}
instructions: ['1. In a bowl, combine the olive oil, tomato paste, paprika, garlic, lemon juice, lemon zest, crushed red pepper, and a large pinch of salt. Add the chicken and toss to coat. Marinate for 15 minutes or up to overnight in the fridge.', '2. Meanwhile, make the cauliflower. Preheat oven to 450 degrees F. On a rimmed baking sheet, combine the cauliflower, 2 tablespoons olive oil, and a pinch each of salt and pepper. Arrange the lemons around the cauliflower. Transfer to the oven and roast for 10-15 minutes, or until tender and charred.', '3. Remove the charred lemon slices from the baking sheet. Finely chop the lemons, rind and all, discarding any of the seeds. Add half of the chopped lemon to a salad bowl. Add the parsley/cilantro, olives, red wine vinegar, and remaining 1/3 cup olive oil. Season with salt and crushed red pepper flakes. Add the cauliflower, cucumbers, and seeds, and toss well.', '4. To make the yogurt, combine the yogurt, grated garlic, and 2-3 tablespoons lemon juice. Season with salt. Taste, adding more of the lemon as desired.', '5. Set your grill, grill pan, or skillet to medium-high heat. Take skewers and thread the chicken pieces on.\xa0Grill the skewers until lightly charred and cooked through, turning them occasionally throughout cooking, about 10 to 12 minutes total.\xa0Alternately, you can roast the chicken at 400 degrees for 20-30 minutes.', '6. To serve, spread the yogurt sauce onto plates. Add the cauliflower salad and chicken. Top with fresh herbs and serve with naan. Enjoy!']

title: 20 Minute Orzo Carbonara with Crispy Prosciutto and Burrata.
ingredients: ['prosciutto, torn', 'large eggs, at room temperature, beaten', 'freshly grated parmesan cheese', 'garlic, grated', 'fresh basil, chopped', 'fresh thyme leaves', 'chopped fresh chives', 'dry orzo pasta', 'salted butter, at room temperature', 'fresh baby spinach, chopped', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'burrata or ricotta cheese, at room temperature', 'fresh herbs and or microgreens, for serving']
ingredients with measurement: {'prosciutto, torn': '3', 'large eggs, at room temperature, beaten': '3', 'freshly grated parmesan cheese': '3/4', 'garlic, grated': '1', 'fresh basil, chopped': '1/4', 'fresh thyme leaves': '2', 'chopped fresh chives': '1', 'dry orzo pasta': '1', 'salted butter, at room temperature': '2', 'fresh baby spinach, chopped': '2', 'kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'burrata or ricotta cheese, at room temperature': '8', 'fresh herbs and or microgreens, for serving': 'seasoning'}

Bring a large pot of salted water to a boil. Boil the orzo until al dente. Before draining, scoop out about 1 cup pasta water, then drain.', '4. Immediately\xa0add the hot orzo to\xa0the egg/cheese mixture, tossing quickly (to ensure the eggs do not scramble) until the eggs thicken and create a sauce. title: Simple Skillet Pesto Cheese Lasagna Roll Ups.
ingredients: ['extra virgin olive oil', 'ground beef, chicken, or ground spicy Italian sausage', 'red bell pepper, chopped', 'garlic, minced or grated', 'crushed San Marzano tomatoes', 'chopped fresh oregano', 'fresh thyme leaves', 'dried fennel seeds', 'crushed red pepper flakes', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'uncooked lasagna noodles', 'whole milk ricotta cheese', 'shredded fontina cheese', 'basil pesto', 'sun-dried tomatoes', 'mozzarella, torn', 'fresh thyme or basil, for serving']
ingredients with measurement: {'extra virgin olive oil': '2', 'ground beef, chicken, or ground spicy Italian sausage': '3/4', 'red bell pepper, chopped': '1', 'garlic, minced or grated': '2', 'crushed San Marzano tomatoes': '1', 'chopped fresh oregano': '1', 'fresh thyme leaves': '1', 'dried fennel seeds': '1', 'crushed red pepper flakes': '1/2', 'kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'uncooked lasagna noodles': '12', 'whole milk ricotta cheese': '1 1/2', 'shredded fontina cheese': '1', 'basil pesto': '3/4', 'sun-dried tomatoes': '1/2', 'mozzarella, torn': '4', 'fresh thyme or basil, for serving': 'seasoning'}
instructions: ['1. Preheat the oven to 425 degrees F.', '2. Heat the olive oil in a large, oven safe skillet. When the oil shimmers, add the ground meat and brown all over, about 5 to 8 minutes. Reduce the heat to low, add the bell pepper, garlic, oregano, thyme, fennel, crushed red pepper flakes, and a pinch each of salt and pepper. Cook 5 minutes, until fragrant. Reduce the heat to low. Add the tomatoes and simmer 10 minutes or until the sauce thickens slightly.', '3. Meanwhile, bring a large pot of salted water to a boil and boil the pasta until al dente. Drain and run under cold water to stop the cooking.', '4. In a medium bowl, combine the ricotta, fontina, 1/2 cup pesto, and sun-dried tomatoes.', '5. To assemble, spoon about 2 tablespoons of the cheese mix down the length of the noodle. Roll into a coil and place each seam-side down in the skillet as you go, snuggling the roll into the sauce. Repeat with remaining noodles. Drizzle the remaining 1/4 cup pesto evenly over everything. Add the mozzarella.', '6. Transfer the skillet to the oven and bake 15-20 minutes or until the cheese has melted and is lightly browned on top. Cool 5 minutes before serving. Serve with fresh basil and thyme, if desired. Enjoy!']

title: Baked Hot Honey Mustard Pretzel Chicken Fingers.
ingredients: ['dijon mustard', 'plain yogurt, sour cream, or olive oil mayo', 'honey', 'boneless chicken tenders', 'finely crushed salted pretzel twists', 'each garlic and onion powder', 'smoked paprika', 'black pepper', 'extra virgin olive oil', 'ranch dressing', 'honey', 'salted butter', 'cayenne pepper', 'chili powder', 'smoked paprika', 'kosher salt']
ingredients with measurement: {'dijon mustard': '1/4', 'plain yogurt, sour cream, or olive oil mayo': '1/4', 'honey': '1/4', 'boneless chicken tenders': '2', 'finely crushed salted pretzel twists': '2', 'each garlic and onion powder': '1', 'smoked paprika': '1/2', 'black pepper': '1', 'extra virgin olive oil': 'seasoning', 'ranch dressing': 'seasoning', 'salted butter': '3', 'cayenne pepper': '1', 'chili powder': '1/2', 'kosher salt': 'seasoning'}
instructions: ['1. In a bowl, whisk together the mustard, yogurt, and honey. Add the chicken and toss well to coat.', '2. Preheat the oven to 425 degrees F. Line a baking sheet with parchment.', '3. Add the pretzel crumbs, garlic powder, onion powder, paprika and a pinch of pepper to a medium sized bowl. Stir to combine.', '4. Remove each piece of chicken from the honey mustard, and dredge through the crumbs, pressing gently to adhere. Place on the prepared baking sheet. Repeat until all the chicken has been used. Make sure not to crowd your pan, if necessary use two baking sheets. Lightly brush/drizzle the chicken with olive oil. Transfer to the oven and bake for 15-20 minutes or until the chicken is cooked through.', '5. Meanwhile, make the spicy honey sauce. Melt together the honey, butter, cayenne, chili powder, paprika, and a pinch of salt.', "6. Serve the chicken topped with flaky salt and spicy honey sauce for dipping. I'd add a side of ranch too. Enjoy!"]

title: Crispy Rice Bowl with Browned Butter Sweet Potatoes and Herby Green Tahini
ingredients: ['sweet potatoes, sliced in half lengthwise', 'extra virgin olive oil', 'honey', 'salted butter', 'crushed red pepper flakes', 'kosher salt', 'zest of 1 lime', 'cooked white or brown rice', 'plain yogurt', 'fried or soft boiled eggs, for serving', 'sliced cucumbers and toasted sesame seeds, for serving', 'tahini', 'fresh basil or cilantro', 'chopped fresh chives', 'jalapeño, halved and seeded, if desired', 'apple cider vinegar', 'juice of 1 lemon']
ingredients with measurement: {'sweet potatoes, sliced in half lengthwise': '2', 'extra virgin olive oil': '4', 'honey': '2', 'salted butter': '4', 'crushed red pepper flakes': 'seasoning', 'kosher salt': 'seasoning', 'zest of 1 lime': 'seasoning', 'cooked white or brown rice': '3', 'plain yogurt': '2', 'fried or soft boiled eggs, for serving': 'seasoning', 'sliced cucumbers and toasted sesame seeds, for serving': 'seasoning', 'tahini': '1/2', 'fresh basil or cilantro': '1', 'chopped fresh chives': '2', 'jalapeño, halved and seeded, if desired': '1', 'apple cider vinegar': '2', 'juice of 1 lemon': 'seasoning'}
instructions: ['1. Preheat the oven to 425 degrees F. On a rimmed baking sheet, combine the sweet potatoes, 2 tablespoons olive oil, and a pinch of salt. Arrange the potatoes cut side down. Transfer to the oven and roast for 25 minutes, until for tender. Flip the potatoes over, drizzle on the honey and 2 tablespoons melted butter. Season with red pepper flakes. Return to the oven and roast until the potatoes are caramelized, about 10-15 additional minutes. Spoon the butter over the potatoes and zest the lime over each potato.', '2. Meanwhile, make the rice. Combine 1 cup of the rice with the yogurt.', '3. Melt together the remaining 2 tablespoons butter and 2 tablespoons oil in a 10-inch skillet set over medium heat. When the butter melts, add the yogurt coated rice and level it out with the back of your spoon. Pile the remaining rice into the pan. Cook the rice over medium heat, until you start to see a golden crust begin to form at the sides of the pan, about 15 minutes. Run a spatula along the edges of the pan to release the rice. Carefully flip the rice onto a plate.', '4. To make the sauce. Combine all ingredients and 1/4 cup water in a blender and blend until completely smooth. If needed, add water to thin the sauce to a drizzling consistency.', '5. To serve, divide the rice between bowls. Add the sweet potatoes, eggs, cucumbers, and additional herbs, if desired. Drizzle each bowl with herby green sauce and sprinkle with sesame seeds. Enjoy!']

title: One Skillet Cheesy Cuban Chicken Rice Bake
ingredients: ['extra virgin olive oil', 'yellow onion, chopped', 'boneless skinless chicken breasts, cubed', 'red bell pepper, chopped', 'garlic, minced or grated', 'dried oregano', 'ground cumin', 'cayenne pepper', 'Kosher salt and black pepper', 'dry broken spaghetti or angel hair pasta', 'long grain rice', 'tomato paste', 'chopped pepperoncini or dill pickles', 'black beans', 'fresh cilantro, chopped, plus more for serving', 'zest and juice of 1 lime, plus more for serving', 'shredded swiss or mozzarella cheese']
ingredients with measurement: {'extra virgin olive oil': '2', 'yellow onion, chopped': '1', 'boneless skinless chicken breasts, cubed': '1', 'red bell pepper, chopped': '1', 'garlic, minced or grated': '2', 'dried oregano': '2', 'ground cumin': '1', 'cayenne pepper': '1/2', 'Kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'dry broken spaghetti or angel hair pasta': '1/2', 'long grain rice': '1', 'tomato paste': '1/4', 'chopped pepperoncini or dill pickles': '2', 'black beans': '1', 'fresh cilantro, chopped, plus more for serving': '1/2', 'zest and juice of 1 lime, plus more for serving': 'seasoning', 'shredded swiss or mozzarella cheese': '1-2'}
instructions: ['1. Preheat the oven to 425 degrees F.', '2. In a large oven safe skillet, heat the olive oil over high heat. When the oil shimmers, add the onion and cook 5 minutes. Stir in the chicken, bell pepper, garlic, oregano, cumin, cayenne, and season with salt and pepper. Cook another 5 minutes until the chicken is browned. Push the chicken and vegetables to one side of the skillet, add the pasta and rice, cook 1-2 minutes, until lightly toasted and golden. Stir in the tomato paste and cook another minute. Add 2 cups of water and the pepperoncini, if using. Bring to a boil. Place the lid on the skillet and turn the heat down to the lowest setting possible. Allow the rice to cook 15 minutes, until most of the liquid has cooked into the rice, but not all of it.', '3. Remove from the heat and stir in the beans, cilantro, lime zest, and lime juice. Sprinkle the cheese over the chicken/rice. Transfer to the oven and bake 10 minutes, until the cheese is melted.', '4. Serve topped as desired with avocado, cilantro, and additional lime. Enjoy!']

title: Slow Cooker Braised Hawaiian Pineapple Chicken Tacos
ingredients: ['boneless skinless chicken breast, thighs, or a pork shoulder/butt', 'pineapple juice', 'low sodium soy sauce', 'honey', 'rice vinegar', 'organic ketchup', 'garlic, finely chopped or grated', 'ground ginger', 'sambal oelek', 'fresh pineapple chunks', 'Gochujang', 'plain Greek yogurt, sour cream, or olive oil mayo', 'juice from 1 lime', 'shredded cabbage', 'fresh cilantro, roughly chopped', 'jalapeño, seeded and chopped', 'warmed tortillas, crunchy Asian noodles and toasted sesame seeds, for serving']
ingredients with measurement: {'boneless skinless chicken breast, thighs, or a pork shoulder/butt': '2', 'pineapple juice': '1/2', 'low sodium soy sauce': '1/2', 'honey': '1/3', 'rice vinegar': '2', 'organic ketchup': '2', 'garlic, finely chopped or grated': '6', 'ground ginger': '2', 'sambal oelek': '1-2', 'fresh pineapple chunks': '2', 'Gochujang': '3-4', 'plain Greek yogurt, sour cream, or olive oil mayo': '1/4', 'juice from 1 lime': 'seasoning', 'shredded cabbage': '3', 'fresh cilantro, roughly chopped': '1/2', 'jalapeño, seeded and chopped': '1', 'warmed tortillas, crunchy Asian noodles and toasted sesame seeds, for serving': 'seasoning'}
instructions: ['1. In the bowl of your slow cooker, combine the chicken, pineapple juice, soy sauce, honey, rice vinegar, ketchup, garlic, ginger, sambal oelek, and 1 cup pineapple chunks. Cover and cook on LOW for 6 hours or on HIGH for 3-4 hours. Once done cooking, switch the slow cooker to high. Cook, uncovered for 30 minutes, to thicken the sauce slightly.', '2. Preheat the broiler to high. Remove the chicken from the sauce to a baking sheet. Lightly shred, then transfer to the broiler. Broil for 1-2 minutes, until the chicken caramelizes. Watch closely!', '3. Stir the caramelized meat back into the sauce.', '4.\xa0Meanwhile, make the yum yum sauce. Combine the Gochujang sauce with the yogurt and lime juice. Season with salt. This is the "yum yum" sauce.', '5. To make the slaw, add the cabbage, remaining 1 cup pineapple chunks, cilantro, and jalapeño to a bowl with a few spoonfuls of the yum yum sauce and toss to combine. Season with salt.', '6. Stuff the chicken into the warmed tortillas. Top with slaw, additional sauce, then add the crunchy noodles and a sprinkle of sesame seeds. Enjoy!']

title: 30 Minute Caramelized Shallot Beef Ramen Noodles
ingredients: ['sesame oil, or extra virgin olive oil', 'shallots, thinly sliced', 'ground beef, chicken, or pork', 'garlic, minced or grated', 'fresh ginger, grated', 'ground cinnamon', 'black pepper', 'low sodium soy sauce or tamari', 'rice vinegar', 'fish sauce', 'honey', 'chili paste', 'brown rice ramen noodles', 'salted butter', 'fresh basil or cilantro, roughly torn', 'toasted peanuts or sesame seeds', 'carrots, green onions, and limes, for serving']
ingredients with measurement: {'sesame oil, or extra virgin olive oil': '2', 'shallots, thinly sliced': '4', 'ground beef, chicken, or pork': '1', 'garlic, minced or grated': '4', 'fresh ginger, grated': '1', 'ground cinnamon': '1/4', 'black pepper': '1', 'low sodium soy sauce or tamari': '1/2', 'rice vinegar': '2', 'fish sauce': '2', 'honey': '3', 'chili paste': '2-3', 'brown rice ramen noodles': '3', 'salted butter': '3', 'fresh basil or cilantro, roughly torn': '1', 'toasted peanuts or sesame seeds': '1/4', 'carrots, green onions, and limes, for serving': 'seasoning'}
instructions: ['1. Heat the oil in a large skillet over medium heat. When the oil shimmers, add the shallots and cook until the shallots begin to caramelize, about 5 minutes. Stir in the beef, garlic, ginger, cinnamon, if using, and pepper. Brown all over, breaking the beef up as it cooks, about 5 minutes. Pour in the soy sauce, vinegar, fish sauce, honey, and chili paste. Bring the sauce to a boil over medium-high heat and cook until the sauce coats the beef, about 5-8 minutes.', '2. Meanwhile, cook the noodles. Bring a large pot of water to a boil. Boil the ramen according to package directions, until al dente. Before you drain the noodles scoop out about 1/2 cup cooking water, drain.', '3. Add the noodles and 1/4 cup of the reserved water to the beef. Add the butter and basil, tossing to combine.', '4. Divide the noodles between plates. Top with peanuts (or sesame seeds), carrots, green onions, and fresh limes. Enjoy!']

title: Crispy Persian Rice (Tahdig) with Spiced Golden Chickpeas
ingredients: ['basmati rice', 'kosher salt', 'plain yogurt', 'salted butter', 'extra virgin olive oil', 'fresh mint or cilantro', 'extra virgin olive oil', 'chickpeas', 'garlic, thinly sliced or smashed', 'shallots, thinly sliced', 'ground turmeric', 'smoked paprika', 'crushed red pepper flakes', 'raw sesame seeds', 'roughly torn greens, such as kale, chard, or spinach']
ingredients with measurement: {'basmati rice': '2', 'kosher salt': 'seasoning', 'plain yogurt': '3', 'salted butter': '3', 'extra virgin olive oil': '1/4', 'fresh mint or cilantro': '1/2', 'chickpeas': '1', 'garlic, thinly sliced or smashed': '2-4', 'shallots, thinly sliced': '2', 'ground turmeric': '1', 'smoked paprika': '1', 'crushed red pepper flakes': '1', 'raw sesame seeds': '2', 'roughly torn greens, such as kale, chard, or spinach': '2'}
instructions: ["1. Bring 6 cups of water and about 1/4 cup salt to a boil in a large pot. It seems like a lot of salt, it's not, trust me.", '2. Rinse the rise under water. Once the water is boiling, add the rice, and stir. Cook, stirring occasionally until al dente, about 6 to 8 minutes. Drain into a sieve and rinse with cold water to stop the cooking.', '3. In a bowl, combine 1 1/2 cups of the rice with the yogurt.', '4. Melt together the butter and oil in a 10-inch skillet set over medium heat. When the butter melts, add the yogurt coated rice and level it out with the back of your spoon. Pile the remaining rice into the pan, mounding it toward the center. Using the handle of a wooden spoon, gently dig 5-6 holes into the rice down to the bottom of the skillet. There should be enough oil in the pan so that you can see it bubbling up the sides. Add oil if needed.', '5. Cook the rice over medium heat, turning the pan a quarter turn every 5 minutes to ensure even browning. Cook until you start to see a golden crust begin to form at the sides of the pan, about 15 minutes. Then reduce the heat to low and continue cooking another 15 to 20 minutes. The edges of the crust should be golden, 35-40 minutes total.', '6. Meanwhile, make the chickpeas. Heat a large, high sided skillet over medium heat. Add the oil, chickpeas, garlic, shallots, turmeric, paprika, a pinch of red pepper flakes, and salt. Cook, stirring occasionally until the chickpeas are crisped all over, about 8-10 minutes. Add the sesame seeds and greens, tossing to combine. Cook 2 minutes, until toasted, remove from the heat.', '7. Run a spatula along the edges of the pan to release the rice. Carefully flip the rice onto a platter. Serve topped with chickpeas, fresh cilantro, or mint.']

title: No Stir Brie Risotto with Lemon Butter Asparagus
ingredients: ['chicken or vegetable broth', 'extra virgin olive oil', 'salted butter', 'garlic, minced or grated', 'Japanese sushi rice or arborio rice', 'dry white wine, such as Pinot Grigio or Sauvignon Blanc', 'kosher salt', 'lemon zest, plus 3 tablespoons lemon juice', 'grated parmesan cheese', 'Brie, rind removed and cubed', 'asparagus, chopped', 'fresh thyme leaves', 'black pepper']
ingredients with measurement: {'chicken or vegetable broth': '6', 'extra virgin olive oil': '3', 'salted butter': '5', 'garlic, minced or grated': '3', 'Japanese sushi rice or arborio rice': '2', 'dry white wine, such as Pinot Grigio or Sauvignon Blanc': '1', 'kosher salt': 'seasoning', 'lemon zest, plus 3 tablespoons lemon juice': '1', 'grated parmesan cheese': '1/4', 'Brie, rind removed and cubed': '8', 'asparagus, chopped': '1', 'fresh thyme leaves': '2', 'black pepper': 'seasoning'}
instructions: ['1. Warm the broth until steaming.', '2. Heat 2 tablespoons olive oil and 2 tablespoons butter in a large pot set over medium-high heat. Add 2 cloves garlic and cook until fragrant, about 30 seconds.\xa0Stir in the rice, cook until lightly golden and toasted, 2-3 minutes. Add the wine and 1 teaspoon salt, continue to cook for 3-4 minutes, or until the wine has absorbed into the rice.\xa0Stir in 5 cups warm broth and bring to a boil over high heat, cover, reduce the heat to low, and simmer for 15 minutes.', '3. Once done cooking, stir in the remaining 1 cup broth, the lemon juice, and parmesan, stirring until thickened, 3-4 minutes. Add the Brie chunks, stir, then remove from the heat. If the risotto thickens up on you, add additional warm broth to thin. It should be creamy, but with just a touch of liquid. Taste, and season with salt.', '4. While the risotto cooks, make the asparagus. Heat the remaining 1 tablespoon olive oil and 3 tablespoons butter in a medium skillet over medium heat. Add 1 clove garlic, the lemon zest and thyme, cook until the garlic is fragrant, about 1 minute. Stir in the asparagus, season with salt and pepper, and cook until tender, about 5 minutes. Remove from the heat.', '5. To serve, divide the risotto in bowls and spoon the asparagus over top. Season with fresh pepper. Enjoy!']

title: Weeknight Thai Peanut Chicken with Spicy Lime Mango
ingredients: ['boneless skinless chicken thighs or breasts', 'Thai red curry paste', 'ground ginger', 'sesame oil or extra virgin olive oil', 'fresh Thai basil or regular basil chopped', 'fresh cilantro, chopped, plus more for serving', 'full fat coconut milk', 'low sodium soy sauce', 'fish sauce', 'creamy peanut butter', 'juice of 1 lime', 'steamed rice, for serving', 'roasted peanuts and Persian cucumbers, for serving', 'mango, diced', 'jalapeño, seeded and chopped', 'juice and zest from 1 lime']
ingredients with measurement: {'boneless skinless chicken thighs or breasts': '1 1/2', 'Thai red curry paste': '3-4', 'ground ginger': '2', 'sesame oil or extra virgin olive oil': '3', 'fresh Thai basil or regular basil chopped': '1/4', 'fresh cilantro, chopped, plus more for serving': '1/4', 'full fat coconut milk': '1', 'low sodium soy sauce': '1/4', 'fish sauce': '2', 'creamy peanut butter': '1/2', 'juice of 1 lime': 'seasoning', 'steamed rice, for serving': 'seasoning', 'roasted peanuts and Persian cucumbers, for serving': 'seasoning', 'mango, diced': '1', 'jalapeño, seeded and chopped': '1', 'juice and zest from 1 lime': 'seasoning'}
instructions: ['1. Toss the chicken with the 2 tablespoons Thai red curry paste, the ginger, and 1 tablespoon oil. Let sit 5 minutes.', '2. Heat 2 tablespoons oil in a large Dutch oven or pot over medium-high heat. Add the chicken and sear on both sides until browned, about 2 minutes. Add the remaining Thai red curry paste, the basil, and the cilantro.', '3. Reduce the heat to low.\xa0Add the coconut milk, soy sauce, fish sauce (if using), and 1/4 cup water. Partially cover and simmer for 20-30 minutes, or until the chicken is cooked through.\xa0Stir in the peanut butter and lime juice. Simmer until thickened, about 5 minutes. Note, there is going to be a lot of sauce.', '4. To make the spicy lime mango. Combine all ingredients in a bowl.', '5. Serve the chicken and sauce over rice. Top with roasted peanuts, cucumbers, and spicy lime mango.']

title: Saucy Tahini Noodles with Honey'd Sweet Potatoes
ingredients: ['small sweet potatoes, sliced into 1/4 inch rounds', 'extra virgin olive oil', 'honey', 'crushed red pepper flakes', 'kosher salt', 'rice noodles', 'tahini', 'low sodium soy sauce or tamari', 'toasted sesame oil', 'honey', 'chili paste', 'fresh ginger, grated', 'garlic, minced or grated', 'juice from 1 lime', 'fresh basil, chopped', 'fresh cilantro, chopped', 'Tuscan kale spinach or bok choy, chopped', 'sliced cucumbers and toasted sesame seeds, for serving']
ingredients with measurement: {'small sweet potatoes, sliced into 1/4 inch rounds': '2', 'extra virgin olive oil': '2', 'honey': '2', 'crushed red pepper flakes': 'seasoning', 'kosher salt': 'seasoning', 'rice noodles': '8', 'tahini': '1/2', 'low sodium soy sauce or tamari': '1/2', 'toasted sesame oil': '2', 'chili paste': '1', 'fresh ginger, grated': '2', 'garlic, minced or grated': '2', 'juice from 1 lime': 'seasoning', 'fresh basil, chopped': '1/4', 'fresh cilantro, chopped': '1/4', 'Tuscan kale spinach or bok choy, chopped': '1', 'sliced cucumbers and toasted sesame seeds, for serving': 'seasoning'}
instructions: ['1. Preheat the oven to 425 degrees F. On a rimmed baking sheet, combine the sweet potatoes, 2 tablespoons olive oil, honey, crushed red pepper flakes, and a pinch each of salt and pepper. Arrange in an even layer. Transfer to the oven and roast for 25-30 minutes, tossing halfway through cooking, until the potatoes are caramelized. During the last 5 minutes of cooking, add the greens to the sheet pan and toss with 1 tablespoon olive oil and a pinch each of salt and pepper. Cook until wilted.', '2. Meanwhile,\xa0bring a large pot of water to a boil. Cook the noodles according to package directions.', '3. Combine in a food processor the tahini, soy sauce, sesame oil, honey, chili paste, ginger, garlic, and 1/4 cup water. Pulse until combined and smooth, adding additional water as needed to thin the sauce. Pour the sauce over the hot noodles. Add the lime juice, basil, and cilantro, tossing to combine.', '4. Divide the noodles between bowls. Top with sweet potatoes and greens. Sprinkle on sesame seeds and finish with cucumbers. Enjoy warm or at room temp.']

title: One Skillet Saucy Chicken Tortilla Enchilada Rice Bake

title: Herby Kale Pesto Pasta with Buttery Walnuts.
ingredients: ['Tuscan kale, roughly chopped', 'fresh basil', 'grated parmesan cheese', 'extra virgin olive oil', 'kosher salt', 'crushed red pepper flakes', 'of your favorite pasta', 'black pepper', 'salted butter', 'raw walnuts', 'chopped fresh thyme', 'zest and juice of 1 lemon', 'garlic, minced or grated', 'fresh burrata cheese, at room temperature']
ingredients with measurement: {'Tuscan kale, roughly chopped': '1', 'fresh basil': '1', 'grated parmesan cheese': '1/2', 'extra virgin olive oil': '1/3', 'kosher salt': 'seasoning', 'crushed red pepper flakes': '1', 'of your favorite pasta': '3/4', 'black pepper': 'seasoning', 'salted butter': '3', 'raw walnuts': '1', 'chopped fresh thyme': '1-2', 'zest and juice of 1 lemon': 'seasoning', 'garlic, minced or grated': '2', 'fresh burrata cheese, at room temperature': '1-2'}
instructions: ['1. In a blender or food processor, combine the kale, basil, parmesan, olive oil, and a pinch of salt and crushed red pepper. Pulse until chunky smooth.', '2.\xa0Bring a large pot of salted water to a boil. Cook the pasta according to package directions until al dente. Reserve 1/2 cup of the pasta cooking water. Drain the pasta.', '3. Meanwhile, heat the butter, walnuts, thyme, lemon zest, and a pinch of salt in a large skillet. Cook 5 minutes, stirring occasionally, until the butter is browned and the walnuts are toasted. Remove the nuts from the skillet to a plate.', '4. Add the garlic to the skillet, cooking 1 minute, until fragrant. Drop the pasta into the skillet. Add the kale pesto, lemon juice, and a pinch of pepper. Toss to combine. Thin the pasta as desired with the reserved pasta cooking water.', '5. Break the burrata into the bottom of each individual serving bowl. Spoon the pasta over the cheese. Top with the buttery walnuts. Enjoy!']

title: Extra Flaky Broccoli Cheddar Soup Mini Pies
ingredients: ['extra virgin olive oil', 'small yellow onion, chopped', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'roughly chopped broccoli florets', 'cremini mushrooms, chopped', 'garlic, minced or grated', 'fresh thyme leaves', 'freshly grated nutmeg', 'cayenne pepper', 'cream cheese, at room temperature', 'shredded sharp cheddar cheese', 'shredded Havarti cheese', 'frozen puff pastry, thawed', 'egg, beaten', 'everything bagel spice, for sprinkling']
ingredients with measurement: {'extra virgin olive oil': '2', 'small yellow onion, chopped': '1', 'kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'roughly chopped broccoli florets': '3', 'cremini mushrooms, chopped': '1', 'garlic, minced or grated': '1', 'fresh thyme leaves': '2', 'freshly grated nutmeg': '1/4', 'cayenne pepper': '1/4-1/2', 'cream cheese, at room temperature': '2', 'shredded sharp cheddar cheese': '1 1/2', 'shredded Havarti cheese': '1/2', 'frozen puff pastry, thawed': '1', 'egg, beaten': '1', 'everything bagel spice, for sprinkling': 'seasoning'}
instructions: ['1. Preheat the oven to 375 degrees F. Line a baking sheet with parchment paper.', '2. Heat the olive oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. When the oil shimmers, add the onion and cook 5 minutes, until softened. Add the broccoli, mushrooms (if using), and season with salt and pepper. Continue cooking another 5-10 minutes or until the broccoli begins to char. Add the garlic, thyme, nutmeg, and cayenne, cook another minute.\xa0Remove from the heat.', '3. Stir in the cream cheese, 1 cup cheddar, and Havarti cheese.', '4. Lay the pastry sheets flat on a clean, floured surface. Gently roll the sheets out to stretch slightly. Cut each sheet into 9 squares. Evenly divide the broccoli filling among half of the squares, leaving a 1/4 inch border around the edges. Brush the edges with egg. Lay the remaining 9 squares over the filling and seal the edges by crimping with the back of a fork.', '5. Place the squares on the prepared baking sheet and brush the tops with beaten egg. Make 2 small slits on the top of the pastries. Sprinkle with the remaining 1/2 cup cheddar cheese and the everything spice, if desired. Transfer to the oven and bake for 20-25 minutes or until golden brown.', '6. Serve warm, topped with additional thyme.']

title: 30 Minute Creamy Sesame Miso Ramen with Crispy Mushrooms.
ingredients: ['low sodium vegetable broth', 'low sodium soy sauce', 'rice vinegar', 'tahini (sesame seed paste)', 'white miso paste', 'hot chili oil', 'dried porcini mushrooms', 'fresh ginger, grated', 'garlic, minced or grated', 'squares ramen noodles', 'shredded kale or baby spinach', 'salted butter, melted or olive oil', 'mixed mushrooms, roughly torn', 'small shallots, sliced', 'raw sesame seeds', 'chili flakes', 'fresh cilantro, chopped', 'soft or hard boiled eggs, for serving', 'sliced carrots and green onions, for serving']
ingredients with measurement: {'low sodium vegetable broth': '6', 'low sodium soy sauce': '1/4', 'rice vinegar': '2', 'tahini (sesame seed paste)': '1/4', 'white miso paste': '3', 'hot chili oil': '2', 'dried porcini mushrooms': '1/4', 'fresh ginger, grated': '1', 'garlic, minced or grated': '2', 'squares ramen noodles': '2-4', 'shredded kale or baby spinach': '4', 'salted butter, melted or olive oil': '4', 'mixed mushrooms, roughly torn': '2', 'small shallots, sliced': '2', 'raw sesame seeds': '2', 'chili flakes': '1/2', 'fresh cilantro, chopped': '1/4', 'soft or hard boiled eggs, for serving': '4-6', 'sliced carrots and green onions, for serving': 'seasoning'}
instructions: ['1. In a large soup pot,\xa0combine the broth, 2 cups water, soy sauce, vinegar, tahini, miso, and chili oil.\xa0Add the dried mushrooms (if using), ginger, and garlic. Set over medium heat on the stove and bring to a simmer, reduce the heat to medium-low and simmer 20 minutes, until the broth is very fragrant.', '2. Remove and discard the mushrooms. Bring the soup to a boil over high heat. Stir in the noodles, kale or spinach, and cilantro. Let sit 5 minutes or until the noodles are soft.', '3. Meanwhile, make the mushrooms. title: One Skillet Greek Meatballs and Lemon Butter Orzo with Whipped Feta
ingredients: ['ground chicken', 'small shallot, finely chopped', 'garlic, minced or grated', 'chopped fresh oregano', 'smoked paprika', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'crushed red pepper flakes', 'extra-virgin olive oil', 'lemon, sliced, plus 3-4 tbs lemon juice', 'salted butter', 'dry orzo pasta', 'pitted green olives', 'chopped fresh dill, plus more for serving', 'oil packed sun-dried tomatoes, chopped, and reserve the oil', 'balsamic vinegar', 'arugula and fresh herbs, for serving', 'feta cheese', 'plain greek yogurt', 'extra virgin olive oil']
ingredients with measurement: {'ground chicken': '1', 'small shallot, finely chopped': '1', 'garlic, minced or grated': '2', 'chopped fresh oregano': '1', 'smoked paprika': '1', 'kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'crushed red pepper flakes': '1', 'extra-virgin olive oil': '2', 'lemon, sliced, plus 3-4 tbs lemon juice': '1', 'salted butter': '2', 'dry orzo pasta': '1', 'pitted green olives': '1/2', 'chopped fresh dill, plus more for serving': '2', 'oil packed sun-dried tomatoes, chopped, and reserve the oil': '1/2', 'balsamic vinegar': '2', 'arugula and fresh herbs, for serving': 'seasoning', 'feta cheese': '8', 'plain greek yogurt': '1/4', 'extra virgin olive oil': '2'}
instructions: ['1. Add the chicken, shallot, 1 clove garlic, oregano, paprika, and a pinch of red pepper, salt, and pepper to a bowl. Mix until just combined. Coat your hands with a bit of oil, roll the meat into tablespoon-size balls (will make 14-15 meatballs).', '2. Heat a large skillet or dutch oven over medium-high heat and add 2 tablespoons oil. When the oil shimmers, add the meatballs and sear until crisp and cooked through, about 8-10 minutes, turning them 2-3 times. Transfer to a plate.', '3. To the same skillet, add the butter and lemon slices. Sear the lemon until golden on each side, about 1 minute. Remove the lemon from the pan and add to the plate with the meatballs. To the same skillet, add 1 clove garlic and the orzo. Cook until the garlic is fragrant and the orzo toasted, about 2-3 minutes. Add the 2 1/2 cups water and 1-2 tablespoons juice from 1 lemon. Bring to a boil over high heat and cook, stirring often, until al dente, about 7-8 minutes. Stir in the olives and dill. Slide the meatballs back into the skillet and cook until warmed through.', '4. Meanwhile, make the sun-dried tomato vinaigrette. In a bowl, whisk together 1/4 cup of the reserved sun-dried tomato oil, 2 tablespoons lemon juice, and the balsamic vinegar until combined. Stir in the sun-dried tomatoes, 1 tablespoon dill, and season with salt, pepper, and red pepper flakes.', '5. To make the feta.\xa0Combine all ingredients in a food processor and pulse until smooth and creamy. The feta can be kept in the fridge for up to 3 days.', '6. To serve, spread the feta onto plates and drizzle with the vinaigrette. Add the orzo, seared lemons, and meatballs. Sprinkle on some greens and herbs. Enjoy!']

title: One Pot Creamy Cauliflower Mac and Cheese
ingredients: ['short-cut pasta, such as macaroni', 'small to medium head cauliflower, roughly chopped', 'canned coconut milk, heavy cream, or whole milk', 'cream cheese, cubed', 'dijon mustard', 'garlic powder', 'shredded sharp cheddar cheese', 'shredded fontina or provolone cheese', 'salted butter', 'Kosher salt and freshly ground pepper', 'cayenne pepper', 'fresh chopped parsley and or chives, for topping']

title: Weeknight Cheesy Baked Chipotle Chicken Tacos with Cilantro Lime Ranch.
ingredients: ['extra virgin olive oil', 'ground chicken, beef, or turkey', 'yellow onion, chopped', 'chipotle chili powder, use to your taste', 'smoked paprika', 'ground cumin', 'garlic powder', 'crushed red pepper, use to your taste', 'dried oregano', 'kosher salt', 'fresh cilantro, chopped', 'hard shell tacos', 'shredded Mexican cheese', 'sour cream or plain Greek yogurt', 'fresh cilantro, finely chopped', 'garlic powder', 'onion powder', 'pickled jalapeños, chopped + 2 tablespoons brine', 'juice from 2 limes', 'kosher salt']
ingredients with measurement: {'extra virgin olive oil': '2', 'ground chicken, beef, or turkey': '1', 'yellow onion, chopped': '1', 'chipotle chili powder, use to your taste': '2-3', 'smoked paprika': '2', 'ground cumin': '1 1/2', 'garlic powder': '1', 'crushed red pepper, use to your taste': '1/4-1/2', 'dried oregano': '1/2', 'kosher salt': '1', 'fresh cilantro, chopped': '1/4', 'hard shell tacos': '12', 'shredded Mexican cheese': '2', 'sour cream or plain Greek yogurt': '1', 'fresh cilantro, finely chopped': '3/4', 'onion powder': '1', 'pickled jalapeños, chopped + 2 tablespoons brine': '1/4', 'juice from 2 limes': 'seasoning'}
instructions: ['1. Preheat the oven to 425 degrees F.', '2. In a large skillet, heat the olive oil over high heat. When the oil shimmers, add the ground chicken and onion. Cook, breaking up the meat as it cooks, until the chicken is browned, about 5 minutes. Add the chipotle chili powder, paprika, cumin, garlic powder, red pepper flakes, oregano, and salt. Add 3/4 cup water. Reduce the heat to medium and simmer until the sauce has thickened slightly around the chicken, about 10 minutes. Remove from the heat and stir in the cilantro.', '3. Line the taco shells up on a sheet pan or in a 9x13 inch baking dish. Transfer to the oven and bake 5 minutes. Evenly divide the meat among each taco shell and top with cheese. title: Roasted Red Pepper Alla Vodka Pasta with Cheesy Oregano Breadcrumbs.
ingredients: ['extra virgin olive oil', 'Panko breadcrumbs', 'fresh oregano leaves', 'grated Manchego or Parmesan cheese, plus more for serving', 'bucatini pasta', 'roasted red peppers', 'red bell pepper, thinly sliced', 'shallots, finely chopped', 'garlic, finely chopped', 'fennel seed', 'crushed red pepper flakes', 'tomato paste', 'vodka', 'apple cider vinegar', 'canned coconut milk , whole milk, or heavy cream', 'salted butter', 'fresh basil or parsley, roughly chopped']
ingredients with measurement: {'extra virgin olive oil': '6', 'Panko breadcrumbs': '3/4', 'fresh oregano leaves': '2', 'grated Manchego or Parmesan cheese, plus more for serving': '1/2', 'bucatini pasta': '1', 'roasted red peppers': '1', 'red bell pepper, thinly sliced': '1', 'shallots, finely chopped': '2', 'garlic, finely chopped': '3', 'fennel seed': '1/2', 'crushed red pepper flakes': '1', 'tomato paste': '1/2', 'vodka': '1/2', 'apple cider vinegar': '3', 'canned coconut milk , whole milk, or heavy cream': '3/4', 'salted butter': '3', 'fresh basil or parsley, roughly chopped': '1/2'}
instructions: ['1. Heat a large, high sided skillet over medium heat. Add 2 tablespoons olive oil, breadcrumbs, and 1 tablespoon oregano, and cook, stirring occasionally until the breadcrumbs are toasted all over, about 3 minutes. Add the cheese and cook another 2 minutes, until fried. Remove the breadcrumbs from the skillet. Season with salt and pepper. Set the crumbs aside.', '2. Add the red peppers to a food processor. Puree until smooth. Season with salt and pepper.', '3. Bring a large pot of salted water to a boil. Add the pasta and cook according to package directions until al dente. Just before draining, remove 1 1/2 cups of the pasta cooking water. Drain.', '4. Meanwhile, place the skillet over high heat along with 4 tablespoons olive oil. When the oil shimmers, add the sliced red bell pepper, shallots, garlic, fennel seeds, 1 tablespoon oregano, and a pinch of red pepper flakes. Cook until the shallots begin to caramelize, about 5 minutes. Reduce the heat to low, add the tomato paste and vinegar, cook 2 minutes. Stir in the roasted red pepper puree, vodka, 1 cup pasta cooking water, milk, and butter. Simmer for 15-30 minutes or until the sauce thickens slightly. Taste and adjust seasonings as needed.', '5.\xa0Add the pasta and basil, tossing to combine. If needed, thin the sauce with additional pasta cooking water.', '6. Divide the pasta among plates and top with breadcrumbs and additional cheese. Enjoy!']

title: Souper Creamy Golden Rice with Spiced Chickpeas
ingredients: ['salted butter', 'ground turmeric', 'crushed red pepper flakes', 'long grain rice, such as jasmine or basmati', 'full fat coconut milk', 'low sodium vegetable or chicken broth', 'kosher salt, plus more as needed', 'roughly torn greens such, as kale, chard, or spinach', 'extra virgin olive oil', 'chickpeas, drained and patted dry', 'garlic, thinly sliced or smashed', 'shallots, thinly sliced', 'ground ginger', 'unsweetened flaked coconut', 'raw sesame seeds', 'fresh mint or cilantro', 'toasted naan, Greek yogurt, and red harissa sauce, for serving']
ingredients with measurement: {'salted butter': '4', 'ground turmeric': '1', 'crushed red pepper flakes': '1', 'long grain rice, such as jasmine or basmati': '1 1/2', 'full fat coconut milk': '1', 'low sodium vegetable or chicken broth': '2-2 1/2', 'kosher salt, plus more as needed': '1', 'roughly torn greens such, as kale, chard, or spinach': '2', 'extra virgin olive oil': '1/4', 'chickpeas, drained and patted dry': '1', 'garlic, thinly sliced or smashed': '2-4', 'shallots, thinly sliced': '2', 'ground ginger': '1/2', 'unsweetened flaked coconut': '1/2', 'raw sesame seeds': '2', 'fresh mint or cilantro': '1/2', 'toasted naan, Greek yogurt, and red harissa sauce, for serving': 'seasoning'}
instructions: ['1. To make the rice. Melt the butter, turmeric, and crushed red pepper flakes in a medium pot over high heat. Add the rice and toss to coat. Stir in 1 1/2 cups of broth, the coconut milk, and a pinch of salt and bring to a boil. Add the greens on top of the rice, but do not stir. Place the lid on the pot and turn the heat down to the lowest setting possible. Allow the rice to cook ten minutes on low and then turn the heat off completely. Let the rice sit, covered, for another 10 minutes.', '2. Meanwhile, make the chickpeas. Heat a large, high sided skillet over medium heat. Add the oil, chickpeas, garlic, shallots, ginger, and a pinch of red pepper flakes and salt. Cook, stirring occasionally until the chickpeas are crisped all over, about 8-10 minutes. Add the coconut flakes and sesame seeds, tossing to combine. Cook 2 minutes, until toasted, remove from the heat.', '3. When the rice is cooked, switch the heat onto low, add additional broth 1/2 cup at a time until the rice is creamy, but with just a touch of liquid. Taste, adding salt as needed.', '4. To serve, divide the rice among bowls and spoon the chickpeas overtop. Serve with naan, yogurt, and fresh mint or cilantro. Enjoy!']

title: Sheet Pan Korean Chicken Bowls with Sweet Potatoes and Yum Yum Sauce.
ingredients: ['medium sweet potatoes, cut into 1 inch cubes', 'toasted sesame or extra virgin olive oil', 'low sodium soy sauce', 'Gochujang', 'honey', 'fresh ginger, grated', 'garlic, grated', 'toasted sesame seeds', 'boneless chicken breasts, cut into 2 inch cubes', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'plain Greek yogurt, sour cream, or olive oil mayo', 'kale, roughly torn', 'juice from 1 lime', 'fresh cilantro, roughly chopped', 'steamed white or brown rice', 'kimichi, avocado, shredded carrots, green onions, sliced cucumbers, and radishes, for serving']
ingredients with measurement: {'medium sweet potatoes, cut into 1 inch cubes': '2', 'toasted sesame or extra virgin olive oil': '3', 'low sodium soy sauce': '1/4', 'Gochujang': '3-4', 'honey': '2', 'fresh ginger, grated': '1', 'garlic, grated': '2', 'toasted sesame seeds': '2', 'boneless chicken breasts, cut into 2 inch cubes': '2', 'kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'plain Greek yogurt, sour cream, or olive oil mayo': '1/4', 'kale, roughly torn': '2-3', 'juice from 1 lime': 'seasoning', 'fresh cilantro, roughly chopped': '1/4', 'steamed white or brown rice': '3', 'kimichi, avocado, shredded carrots, green onions, sliced cucumbers, and radishes, for serving': 'seasoning'}
instructions: ['1. Preheat the oven to 425 degrees F. On a rimmed baking sheet, toss the sweet potatoes with 1 tablespoon oil, salt, and pepper. Transfer to the oven and roast for 20 minutes.', '2. To make the Gochujang sauce. In a glass jar, combine the soy sauce, Gochujang, honey, ginger, garlic, 1 tablespoon oil, and the sesame seeds.', '3. Add the chicken to a bowl and toss with half of the Gochujang sauce. Remove the potatoes from the oven and slide them to 1 side of the pan. Add the chicken and any sauce left in the bowl to the other side. Return to the oven and continue roasting another 15 minutes, until the chicken is cooked through. During the last 2-3 minutes of cooking, switch the oven to broil and broil until the chicken chars on the edges and the sauce sticks to the chicken. Watch closely, the broiler can burn food fast.', '3. Meanwhile, combine 2-3 tablespoons of the remaining Gochujang sauce with the yogurt. Season with salt. This is the "yum yum" sauce. Reserve any remaining Gochujang sauce for serving.', '5. In a bowl, toss the kale with 1 tablespoon oil, the lime juice, and a pinch of salt. Toss in the cilantro.', '6. To serve, divide the rice between bowls. Top with chicken, potatoes, kale, and avocado. Add additional toppings as desired. Serve drizzled with the "Yum Yum" sauce.']

title: Better Than Takeout Garlic Butter Shrimp Pad Thai.
ingredients: ['wide rice noodles', 'low sodium soy sauce, using more or less to taste', 'fish sauce', 'white vinegar', 'honey or maple', 'chili flakes, plus more for serving', 'raw jumbo shrimp, peeled and deveined', 'peanut oil or extra virgin olive oil', 'garlic, finely chopped or grated', 'salted butter', 'eggs, beaten', 'bean sprouts or chopped baby bok coy', 'green onions, chopped, plus more for serving', 'roasted peanuts, chopped', 'Thai or regular basil and limes, for serving']

title: Oven Fried Cajun Popcorn Chicken with Creamy Honey Mustard
ingredients: ['boneless chicken breasts, cut into 2 inch cubes', 'buttermilk', 'corn flakes', 'whole wheat, all-purpose, or gluten free flour', 'cajun seasoning', 'finely shredded sharp cheddar cheese', 'black pepper', 'extra virgin olive oil', 'dijon mustard', 'honey', 'sour cream, plain Greek yogurt, or olive oil based mayo', 'extra virgin olive oil', 'juice of 1/2 a lemon', 'cajun seasoning', 'cayenne pepper', 'kosher salt and black pepper']
